judgement.zh:
乾：元亨，利贞。

原文出自《周易》乾卦卦辞。
简要解释：大通顺，大吉大利，利于守正、坚持正道。代表事物处于最强盛、最纯粹的阳刚状态，开始极好、发展顺利，但必须保持正直才能长久有利。
judgement.en: THE CREATIVE works sublime success, Furthering through perseverance.

image.zh:
象曰：天行健，君子以自强不息。

简要解释：天的运行刚健有力，从不停止。君子看到这个现象，就要效法天道，让自己永远努力向上、坚强不懈，永不松懈、永不退缩。
image.en: The movement of heaven is full of power. Thus the superior man makes himself strong and untiring.

tuan.en: According to the original meaning, the attributes [sublimity, potentiality of success, power to further, perseverance] are paired. When an individual draws this oracle, it means that success will come to him from the primal depths of the universe and that everything depends upon his seeking his happiness and that of others in one way only, that is, by perseverance in what is right. The specific meanings of the four attributes became the subject of speculation at an early date. The Chinese word here rendered by "sublime" means literally "head," "origin," "great." This is why Confucius says in explaining it: "Great indeed is the generating power of the Creative; all beings owe their beginning to it. This power permeates all heaven." For this attribute inheres in the other three as well. The beginning of all things lies still in the beyond in the form of ideas that have yet to become real. But the Creative furthermore has power to lend form to these archetypes of ideas. This is indicated in the word success, and the process is represented by an image from nature: "The clouds pass and the rain does its work, and all individual beings flow into their forms." Applies to the human world, these attributes show the great man the way to notable success: "Because he sees with great clarity and cause and effects, he completes the six steps at the right time and mounts toward heaven on them at the right time, as though on six dragons." The six steps are the six different positions given in the hexagram, which are represented later by the dragon symbol. Here it is shown that the way to success lies in apprehending and giving actuality to the way of the universe [Tao], which, as a law running through end and beginning, brings about all phenomena in time. Thus each step attained forthwith becomes a preparation for the next. Time is no longer a hindrance but the means of making actual what is potential. The act of creation having found expression in the two attributes sublimity and success, the work of conservation is shown to be a continuous actualization and differentiation of form. This is expressed in the two terms "furthering" (literally, "creating that which accords with the nature of a given being") and "persevering" (literally, "correct and firm"). "The course of the Creative alters and shapes beings until each attains its true, specific nature, then it keeps them in conformity with the Great Harmony. Thus does it show itself to further through perseverance." In relation to the human sphere, this shows how the great man brings peace and security to the world through his activity in creating order: "He towers high above the multitude of beings, and all lands are united in peace." Another line of speculation goes still further in separating the words "sublime," "success," "furthering," "perseverance," and parallels them with the four cardinal virtues in humanity. To sublimity, which, as the fundamental principle, embraces all the other attributes, it links love. To the attribute success are linked the morals, which regulate and organize expressions of love and thereby make them successful. The attribute furthering is correlated with justice, which creates the conditions in which each receives that which accords with his being, that which is due him and which constitutes his happiness. The attribute perseverance is correlated with wisdom, which discerns the immutable laws of all that happens and can therefore bring about enduring conditions. These speculations, already broached in the commentary called Wên Yen , later formed the bridge connecting the philosophy of the "five stages (elements) of change," as laid down in the Book of History (Shu Ching) with the philosophy of the Book of Changes, which is based solely on the polarity of positive and negative principles. In the course of time this combination of the two systems of thought opened the way for an increasingly intricate number symbolism.

lines.zh:
初九：潜龙，勿用。
（刚开始还藏在水底，别急着表现，先默默发育攒实力）
lines.en: Hidden dragon. Do not act.

lines.zh:
九二：见龙在田，利见大人。
（龙已经露头在田野了，有真本事开始被看见了，这时候适合去接触有格局的大佬，容易得到赏识和帮助）
lines.en: Dragon appearing in the field. It furthers one to see the great man.

lines.zh:
九三：君子终日乾乾，夕惕若，厉无咎。
（白天拼命干，晚上还提心吊胆地反省，已经很厉害但位置尴尬，战战兢兢反而没事，松懈反而有危险）
lines.en: All day long the superior man is creatively active. At nightfall his mind is still beset with cares. Danger. No blame.

lines.zh:
九四：或跃在渊，无咎。
（到了关键决策点，要不要跳？可以试着起飞，也可以继续沉潜观察，随你选，只要别瞎搞就不会有大错）
lines.en: Wavering flight over the depths. No blame.

lines.zh:
九五：飞龙在天，利见大人。
（龙已经飞到最高处，处于人生/事业巅峰，这时候最适合跟真正的大人物合作、做事，效果最好）
lines.en: Flying dragon in the heavens. It furthers one to see the great man.

lines.zh:
上九：亢龙有悔。
（龙飞得太高太满，太过刚强过头了，物极必反，会后悔。提醒再牛也要懂得收敛、知进知退）
lines.en: Arrogant dragon will have cause to repent.

summary.zh:
嘿，抽到乾卦就是六个阳爻，全满状态，超级刚猛、超级有力量的一卦。
一句话总结：现在是你最猛、最有冲劲、最能carry全场的时候，但别飘——要一直硬扛、一直往前冲、千万别停、也千万别歪，不然这股劲儿很容易把自己玩崩。简单讲就是：使劲儿干、使劲儿卷、但得正着卷！

judgement.zh:
坤：元亨，利牝马之贞。君子有攸往，先迷后得主，利西南得朋，东北丧朋。安贞吉。
简释：坤卦大通顺，利于像母马一样柔顺、守正。君子有所行动，如果抢先会迷失方向，跟随在后反而能找到正确的主人。西南方向有利可得朋友，东北方向会失去朋友。保持安静守正就会吉祥。
judgement.en: THE RECEPTIVE brings about sublime success, Furthering through the perseverance of a mare. If the superior man undertakes something and tries to lead, He goes astray; But if he follows, he finds guidance. It is favorable to find friends in the west and south, To forego friends in the east and north. Quiet perseverance brings good fortune.

image.zh:
象曰：地势坤，君子以厚德载物。
简释：大地广阔厚实、承载万物，君子看到这个卦象，就要效法大地，用宽厚的德行去包容、承载一切人事物。
image.en: The earth's condition is receptive devotion. Thus the superior man who has breadth of character Carries the outer world.

tuan.en: The four fundamental aspects of the Creative--"sublime success, furthering through perseverance"--are also attributed to the Receptive. Here, however, the perseverance is more closely defined: it is that of a mare. The Receptive connotes spatial reality in contrast to the spiritual potentiality of the Creative. The potential becomes real and the spiritual becomes spatial through a specifically qualifying definition. Thus the qualification, "of a mare," is here added to the idea of perseverance. The horse belongs to earth just as the dragon belongs to heaven. Its tireless roaming over the plains is taken as a symbol of the vast expanse of the earth. This is the symbol chosen because the mare combines the strength and swiftness of the horse with the gentleness and devotion of the cow. Only because nature in its myriad forms corresponds with the myriad impulses of the Creative can it make these impulses real. Nature's richness lies in its power to nourish all living things; its greatness lies in its power to give then beauty and splendor. Thus it prospers all that lives. IT is the Creative that begets things, but they are brought to birth by the Receptive. Applied to human affairs, therefore, what the hexagram indicated is action in conformity with the situation. The person in questions not in an independent position, but is acting as an assistant. This means that he must achieve something. It is not his task to try to lead--that would only make him lose the way-but to let himself be led. If he knows how to meet fate with an attitude of acceptance, he is sure to find the right guidance. The superior man lets himself be guided; he does not go ahead blindly, but learns from the situation what is demanded of him and then follows this intimation from fate. Since there is something to be accomplished, we need friends and helpers in the hour of toil and effort, once the ideas to be realized are firmly set. The time of toil and effort is indicated by the west and south, for west and south symbolize the place where the Receptive works for the Creative, as nature does in summer and autumn. If in that situation one does not mobilize all one's powers, the work to be accomplished will not be done. Hence to find friends there means to find guidance. But in addition to the time of toil and effort, there is also a time of planning, and for this we need this solitude. The east symbolized the place where a man receives orders from his master, and the north the place where he reports on what he has done. At that time he must be alone and objective. In this sacred hour he must do without companions. So that the purity of the moment may not be spoiled by fictional hates and favoritism.

lines.zh:
初六：履霜，坚冰至。
解释：踩到一点霜了，预示着大冻就要来了。提醒见微知著，小问题不处理后面会变严重。
lines.en: When there is hoarfrost underfoot, Solid ice is not far off.

lines.zh:
六二：直方大，不习无不利。
解释：正直、方正、容量广大，就算没啥经验也不会不利。形容真正有德的人自然而然就做得好。
lines.en: Straight, square, great. Without purpose, Yet nothing remains unfurthered.

lines.zh:
六三：含章可贞。或从王事，无成有终。
解释：内里藏着美好文采但保持低调守正。假如参与国家大事，不抢着居功、但能善始善终就行。
lines.en: Hidden lines. One is able to remain persevering. If by chance you are in the service of a king, Seek not works, but bring to completion.

lines.zh:
六四：括囊，无咎无誉。
解释：把口袋扎紧（谨言慎行、低调不露锋芒），这样既不会出错，也不会得到特别赞誉。明哲保身的中庸之道。
lines.en: A tied-up sack. No blame, no praise.

lines.zh:
六五：黄裳，元吉。
解释：穿黄色的下裳（中正、柔顺又有分寸），大吉大利。这是坤卦最尊贵、最好的位置，代表柔中带正、极致中庸的最高境界。
lines.en: A yellow lower garment brings supreme good fortune.

lines.zh:
上六：龙战于野，其血玄黄。
解释：阴气发展到极点，阴阳开始激烈冲突，像两条龙在野外打架，流出的血是黑黄相间。物极必反，柔顺过头就变阴谋、争斗，结局惨烈。
lines.en: Dragons fight in the meadow. Their blood is black and yellow.

summary.zh: 哎，坤卦就是最纯的阴、最柔顺、最接地气的一卦。核心就俩字：顺和厚。像大地一样啥都装得下、不争先、但也不瞎争，懂得低调、包容、跟着对的方向走就行。别老想着出头当老大，踏实、忍耐、厚道反而最后啥都有。生活中遇到坤卦，多半提醒你：别硬刚，先服软、稳住、慢慢来，反而路会越走越宽。

judgement.zh:
屯：元亨，利贞。勿用有攸往，利建侯。

原文卦辞意思是：屯卦有大吉大利的潜质，坚持正道有利。但现在千万不要急着行动、有所前往，在这种艰难起步阶段，最有利的是建立同盟、培养根基、封侯建国（拉队伍、找伙伴、打基础）。
judgement.en: DIFFICULTY AT THE BEGINNING works supreme success, Furthering through perseverance. Nothing should be undertaken. It furthers one to appoint helpers.

image.zh:
象曰：云，雷，屯；君子以经纶。

象辞说：云在上，雷在下，这就是屯卦的景象。君子看到这个卦象，就要学习像云雷酝酿大雨一样，在混乱草创时期辛勤筹划、治理天下（经纶就是经天纬地、规划大业的意思）。
image.en: Clouds and thunder: The image of DIFFICULTY AT THE BEGINNING. Thus the superior man Brings order out of confusion.

tuan.en: Times of growth are beset with difficulties. They resemble a first birth. But these difficulties arise from the very profusion of all that is struggling to attain form . Everything is in motion: therefore if one perseveres there is a prospect of great success, in spite of the existing danger. When it is a man's fate to undertake such new beginnings, everything is still unformed, dark. Hence he must hold back, because any premature move might bring disaster. Likewise, it is very important not to remain alone; in order to overcome the chaos he needs helpers. This is not to say, however, that he himself should look on passively at what is happening. He must lend his hand and participate with inspiration and guidance.

lines.zh:
初九：盘桓，利居贞，利建侯。
刚起步最迷茫，像石头一样转圈徘徊（盘桓）。这时候最聪明的是待在原地守正、别乱跑，同时赶紧拉队伍、建根据地（利建侯），才能聚人气、得民心。
lines.en: Hesitation and hindrance. It furthers one to remain persevering. It furthers one to appoint helpers.

lines.zh:
六二：屯如邅如，乘马班如。匪寇，婚媾。女子贞不字，十年乃字。
难上加难，犹豫徘徊，马儿转圈圈。来的不是土匪，是来求亲的队伍。可惜时机不对，女子守贞不嫁，硬是等了十年才成婚。意思是：好机会看着近在眼前，但条件不成熟，硬上只会翻车，必须超级有耐心熬到时机真正成熟。
lines.en: Difficulties pile up. Horse and wagon part. He is not a robber; He wants to woo when the time comes. The maiden is chaste, She does not pledge herself. Ten years--then she pledges herself.

lines.zh:
六三：即鹿无虞，惟入于林中。君子几，不如舍，往吝。
追鹿没带向导（虞），结果鹿跑进密林里了。君子一看苗头不对，果断放弃，继续追只会自讨苦吃、陷入困境。提醒：看不清路、没人带、没把握的时候，千万别逞英雄，及时止损才是真智慧。
lines.en: Whoever hunts deer without the forester Only loses his way in the forest. The superior man understands the signs of the time And prefers to desist. To go on brings humiliation.

lines.zh:
九四：乘马班如，求婚媾，往吉，无不利。
还是骑着马转圈，但这次是主动去求婚。往前走反而吉祥，一切有利。意思是：前面几爻憋得慌，到这里终于可以动了，但前提是你得主动出击、诚心求助或联姻，方向对了就一路绿灯。
lines.en: Horse and wagon part. Strive for union. To go brings good fortune. Everything acts to further.

lines.zh:
九五：屯其膏，小贞吉，大贞凶。
囤积了很多油脂（财富、资源），小事守正吉祥，大事守正反而凶。意思是：现在有点小富即安的感觉，小打小闹、维持现状还行，但想干大事、扩张版图的话，这时候的保守反而会坏事，得有更大魄力突破。
lines.en: Difficulties in blessing. A little perseverance brings good fortune. Great perseverance brings misfortune.

lines.zh:
上六：乘马班如，泣血涟如。
骑马还在转圈，眼泪鼻血一起流，哭得撕心裂肺。最惨的结局：错过时机、犹豫太久、到最后机会彻底没了，只能悲伤欲绝。警告：屯的艰难期不能无限拖，该动的时候不动，最后会哭都来不及。
lines.en: Horse and wagon part. Bloody tears flow.

summary.zh: 哎，屯卦就是那句老话——万事开头难。刚开始创业、恋爱、生小孩、做任何新事，都像春天小草拱土、雷雨交加前那种憋屈劲儿，到处是险阻、迷雾、动弹不得。但好消息是：它虽然难，却有元亨利贞的潜质，只要你别瞎冲、沉住气，先别想着一步登天，赶紧找靠谱伙伴、搭好团队、把地基打牢，熬过这阵最难受的阵痛期，后头就是生机勃勃、欣欣向荣了。简单说：起步期别浪，抱团发育最稳。

judgement.zh:
蒙。亨。匪我求童蒙，童蒙求我。初筮告，再三渎，渎则不告。利贞。
解释：蒙卦代表蒙昧、启蒙阶段，虽然处于愚昧不明，但却是亨通的。不是老师主动去求学生，而是学生（童蒙）主动来求老师。第一次真诚求教就解答，如果反复轻率亵渎，就不再回答。利于守持正道。
judgement.en: YOUTHFUL FOLLY has success. It is not I who seek the young fool; The young fool seeks me. At the first oracle I inform him. If he asks two or three times, it is importunity. If he importunes, I give him no information. Perseverance furthers.

image.zh:
象曰：山下出泉，蒙。君子以果行育德。
解释：山下涌出泉水，这就是蒙卦的象征。君子看到这个景象，就要果断行动、坚定前行，同时培养自己的道德品行，就像泉水从山下源源不断涌出一样，坚持不懈地自我提升。
image.en: A spring wells up at the foot of the mountain: The image of YOUTH. Thus the superior man fosters his character By thoroughness in all that he does.

tuan.en: In the time of youth, folly is not an evil. One may succeed in spite of it, provided one finds an experienced teacher and has the right attitude toward him. This means, first of all, that the youth himself must be conscious of his lack of experience and must seek out the teacher. Without this modesty and this interest there is no guarantee that he has the necessary receptivity, which should express itself in respectful acceptance of the teacher. This is the reason why the teacher must wait to be sought out instead of offering himself. Only thus can the instruction take place at the right time and in the right way. A teacher's answer to the question of a pupil ought to be clear and definite like that expected from an oracle; thereupon it ought to be accepted as a key for resolution of doubts and a basis for decision. If mistrustful or unintelligent questioning is kept up, it serves only to annoy the teacher. He does well to ignore it in silence, just as the oracle gives one answer only and refuses to be tempted by questions implying doubt. Given addition a perseverance that never slackens until the points are mastered one by one, real success is sure to follow. Thus the hexagram counsels the teacher as well as the pupil.

lines.zh:
初六：发蒙，利用刑人，用说桎梏。以往吝。
刚开始最蒙的时候，得用规矩、刑罚来规范，就像给犯人解开手铐脚镣帮他改过。但如果急于求成往前冲，反而会有遗憾和困难。
lines.en: To make a fool develop It furthers one to apply discipline. The fetters should be removed. To go on in this way bring humiliation.

lines.zh:
九二：包蒙，吉。纳妇吉。子克家。
最吉利的老师爻！能包容各种蒙昧学生，像有教无类一样广泛接纳。就像娶媳妇生孩子、儿子能撑起家一样，教育得好，后继有人，大吉。
lines.en: To bear with fools in kindliness brings good fortune. To know how to take women Brings good fortune. The son is capable of taking charge of the household.

lines.zh:
六三：勿用取女，见金夫，不有躬。无攸利。
别娶那种见钱眼开、见帅哥/有钱人就失身的女人。比喻有些学生见好处就变节、见更好的老师就跑路，三心二意，这种人教了也没用，什么事都干不成。
lines.en: Take not a maiden who. When she sees a man of bronze, Loses possession of herself. Nothing furthers.

lines.zh:
六四：困蒙，吝。
自己被困在蒙昧里，孤立无援，远离好老师和正能量，挺惨的，有小遗憾、小困难。得赶紧找人带带，不然一直迷糊下去。
lines.en: Entangled folly bring humiliation.

lines.zh:
六五：童蒙，吉。
保持像小孩子一样纯真求知的蒙昧状态，反而吉祥。谦虚、柔顺、愿意听老师的话，这种态度最容易开窍、最有前途。
lines.en: Childlike folly brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
上九：击蒙，不利为寇，利御寇。
用严厉手段敲打启蒙可以，但不能太过火变成攻击别人（为寇），而是要用来防御坏影响、防止学生学坏（御寇）。教育该硬的时候要硬，但目的是保护和纠正，不是报复。
lines.en: In punishing folly It does not further one To commit transgressions. The only thing that furthers Is to prevent transgressions.

summary.zh: 嘿，兄弟，这蒙卦简单说就是‘懵懂期要好好学’的意思。人生或事情刚起步时，谁都迷迷糊糊，像小孩啥都不懂，这时候最关键的就是启蒙教育。老师别硬塞，学生得自己主动求教才行；学东西要真心实意，别三心二意反复骚扰老师，不然老师也懒得搭理你。核心就俩字：求学要诚，教育要正。守住初心、保持纯正，慢慢就开窍了，未来一片光明。

judgement.zh:
需：有孚，光亨，贞吉。利涉大川。

原文意思：需卦象征等待。保持诚信（有孚），前景光明通达（光亨），守正就会吉祥（贞吉）。有利于渡过大河难关（利涉大川）。
简单说：现在时机未到，要耐心等，但只要有诚意、正直，最终会很顺利，甚至能干大事。
judgement.en: WAITING. If you are sincere, You have light and success. Perseverance brings good fortune. It furthers one to cross the great water.

image.zh:
象曰：云上于天，需；君子以饮食宴乐。

象辞意思：云在天上，还没下雨，这就是需卦的景象。君子看到这个意象，就安心吃喝、宴会享乐（不强求、不焦虑）。
换句话说：该等的时候就好好过日子，别把自己搞得太紧张。
image.en: Clouds rise up to heaven: The image of WAITING. Thus the superior man eats and drinks, Is joyous and of good cheer.

tuan.en: Waiting is not mere empty hoping. It has the inner certainty of reaching the goal. Such certainty alone gives that light which leads to success. This leads to the perseverance that brings good fortune and bestows power to cross the great water. One is faced with a danger that has to be overcome. Weakness and impatience can do nothing. Only a strong man can stand up to his fate, for his inner security enables him to endure to the end. This strength shows itself in uncompromising truthfulness [with himself]. It is only when we have the courage to face things exactly as they are, without any sort of self-deception or illusion, that a light will develop out of events, by which the path to success may be recognized. This recognition must be followed by resolute and persevering action. For only the man who goes to meet his fate resolutely is equipped to deal with it adequately. Then he will be able to cross the great water--that is to say, he will be capable of making the necessary decision and of surmounting the danger.

lines.zh:
初九：需于郊。利用恒，无咎。
在郊外等待。保持恒心不变，就没灾祸。→刚开始等，别急着进城，先远远看着，稳住心态最重要。
lines.en: Waiting in the meadow. IT furthers one to abide in what endures. No blame.

lines.zh:
九二：需于沙。小有言，终吉。
在沙地上等待。会受到一点言语是非，但最终吉祥。→位置比初九近了点，开始听到风言风语了，别跟人吵，忍一忍就过去了。
lines.en: Waiting on the sand. There is some gossip. The end brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
九三：需于泥，致寇至。
在泥泞中等待，招来盗寇。
→太靠近危险地带了，位置尴尬，容易惹祸上身。这爻提醒：别站错队、别太冒进，否则等还没等到好结果，先被坑了。
lines.en: Waiting in the mud Brings about the arrival of the enemy.

lines.zh:
六四：需于血，出自穴。
在血泊中等待，最终能从险境的洞穴里出来。
→处境已经很危险了（血=伤），但只要坚持等待、不乱动，还是能脱险。比较惨但有转机的一爻。
lines.en: Waiting in blood. Get out of the pit.

lines.zh:
九五：需于酒食，贞吉。
在酒食宴乐中等待，守正就吉祥。
→这是需卦最好的位置！一边等一边吃吃喝喝，该干的事没耽误，心态也稳，最后大吉。典型的高位躺赢爻。
lines.en: Waiting at meat and drink. Perseverance brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
上六：入于穴，有不速之客三人来，敬之终吉。
进入洞穴，有三个不请自来的客人到来，恭敬对待他们最终吉祥。
→等太久了，忍不住想自己动手，结果引来意外之人。但只要态度好、尊重对方，反而因祸得福。最后一爻常有反转。
lines.en: One falls into the pit. Three uninvited guests arrive. Honor them, and in the end there will be good fortune.

summary.zh: 需卦就是告诉你：现在别急，时机还没成熟，强行往前冲大概率翻车。像排队买限量款一样，前面人多你就得等。真正聪明的人不是在那干瞪眼急得跳脚，而是该吃饭吃饭、该睡觉睡觉，该干嘛干嘛，心里有数，等风来了自然起飞。核心就四个字：耐心+诚信=后来居上。

judgement.zh:
讼：有孚窒，惕，中吉，终凶。利见大人，不利涉大川。

原文意思是：争讼是因为诚信被阻塞，心中有所警惕戒惧。过程中可能有吉祥，但最终结果是凶险的。利于去求见有德有位的大人来裁决，不利于冒险涉险渡大河（象征不要逞强、冒险激化矛盾）。
judgement.en: CONFLICT. You are sincere And are being obstructed. A cautious halt halfway brings good fortune. Going through to the end brings misfortune. It furthers one to see the great man. It does not further one to cross the great water.

image.zh:
天与水违行，讼。君子以作事谋始。

原文意思是：天向西转，水向东流，方向相反违背而行，这就是讼的卦象。君子看到这个卦象，就要在做事情一开始就深思熟虑、慎重谋划，避免争端产生。
image.en: Heaven and water go their opposite ways: The image of CONFLICT. Thus in all his transactions the superior man Carefully considers the beginning.

tuan.en: Conflict develops when one feels himself to be in the right and runs into opposition. If one is not convinced of being in the right, opposition leads to craftiness or high-handed encroachment but not to open conflict. If a man is entangled in a conflict, his only salvation lies in being so clear-headed and inwardly strong that he is always ready to come to terms by meeting the opponent halfway. To carry one the conflict to the bitter end has evil effects even when one is the right, because the enmity is then perpetuated. It is important to see the great man, that is, an impartial man whose authority is great enough to terminate the conflict amicably or assure a just decision. In times of strife, crossing the great water is to be avoided, that is, dangerous enterprises are not to be begun, because in order to be successful they require concerted unity of focus. Conflict within weakens the power to conquer danger without.

lines.zh:
初六：不永所事，小有言，终吉。
意思是：不要把争执没完没了地拖下去，虽然会有点小口舌、小是非，但最终是吉祥的。→ 建议小矛盾别纠缠，及时止损就好。
lines.en: If one does not perpetuate the affair, There is a little gossip. In the end, good fortune comes.

lines.zh:
九二：不克讼，归而逋，其邑人三百户无眚。
意思是：打官司打不赢，赶紧回家躲起来（逃避），连带着自己封邑里的三百户人家都没灾祸。
→ 实力不够就别硬碰，认怂撤退反而保平安。
lines.en: One cannot engage in conflict; One returns home, gives way. The people of his town, Three hundred households, Remain free of guilt.

lines.zh:
六三：食旧德，贞厉，终吉。或从王事，无成。
意思是：安守着祖上或过去的德行福荫，坚守正道虽然有危险，但最终吉祥。如果去帮官府做事，反而难有成就。
→ 低调守旧、别出头，别想着靠争讼立功。
lines.en: To nourish oneself on ancient virtue induces perseverance. Danger. In the end, good fortune comes. If by chance you are in the service of a king, Seek not works.

lines.zh:
九四：不克讼，复即命，渝，安贞吉。
意思是：官司还是打不赢，那就回头听从天命、改变态度，安守正道就吉祥。
→ 知难而退、及时调整心态、回归正轨，反而转危为安。
lines.en: One cannot engage in conflict. One turns back and submits to fate, Changes one's attitude, And finds peace in perseverance. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
九五：讼，元吉。
意思是：官司打得非常成功，大吉大利。
→ 这是全卦最爽的一爻，通常代表遇到公正的大人或自己处于中正有理的位置，官司能大获全胜。
lines.en: To contend before him Brings supreme good fortune.

lines.zh:
上九：或锡之鞶带，终朝三褫之。
意思是：或许被赏赐了大官带（很高荣誉），但一天之内就被三次剥夺。
→ 就算赢了官司、得了大好处，也守不住，很快就会被夺走、乐极生悲。提醒胜讼也不要得意忘形。
lines.en: Even if by chance a leather belt is bestowed on one,' By the end of a morning It will have been snatched away three times.

summary.zh: 嘿，这讼卦简单说就是一句话：别轻易打官司、吵架、闹矛盾！一开始可能觉得自己有理、能占点便宜，但越闹越大，最后基本没好下场。最好的办法是找个有权威、讲道理的大佬来调解，千万别自己硬刚、冒险扩大事态。核心就俩字——‘息讼’、‘慎始’，能忍就忍，能和就和，凡事从一开始就想清楚，别走到法庭见。

judgement.zh:
师。贞，丈人吉，无咎。

意思是：用兵打仗要出师有名（贞正），任用德高望重、经验丰富的老成持重之人（丈人）来统帅军队，就能吉祥，没有灾祸。
judgement.en: THE ARMY. The army needs perseverance And a strong man. Good fortune without blame. An army is a mass that needs organization in order to become a fighting force.

image.zh:
象曰：地中有水，师。君子以容民畜众。

意思是：大地里面藏着水，这就是师卦的卦象。君子看到这个景象，就应该平时广泛接纳、包容百姓，蓄养众人（寓兵于农，藏兵于民），为有需要时聚集力量做准备。
image.en: In the middle of the earth is water: The image of THE ARMY. Thus the superior man increases his masses By generosity toward the people.

tuan.en: Without strict discipline nothing can be accomplished, but this discipline must not be achieved by force. It requires a strong man who captures the hearts of the people and awakens their enthusiasm. In order that he may develop his abilities he needs the complete confidence of his ruler, who must entrust him with full responsibility as long as the war lasts. But war is always a dangerous thing and brings with it destruction and devastation. Therefore it should not be resorted to rashly but, like a poisonous drug, should be used as a last recourse.

lines.zh:
初六：师出以律，否臧凶。
出兵打仗一定要有严格的军纪法律约束，不然纪律败坏就非常凶险。
lines.en: An army must set forth in proper order. If the order is not good, misfortune threatens.

lines.zh:
九二：在师中吉，无咎，王三锡命。
作为统帅身在军队中间持中守正，就能吉祥，没有灾祸，还会得到君王多次（三锡）褒奖嘉命。
lines.en: In the midst of the army. Good fortune. No blame. The king bestows a triple decoration.

lines.zh:
六三：师或舆尸，凶。
带兵打仗如果搞成有人用车拉着尸体回来这种惨况，那就大凶，基本是打了大败仗。
lines.en: Perchance the army carries corpses in the wagon. Misfortune.

lines.zh:
六四：师左次，无咎。
军队暂时退到左边（侧翼或安全地带）驻扎休整，没有灾祸（懂得适时退守、不硬拼也是智慧）。
lines.en: The army retreats. No blame.

lines.zh:
六五：田有禽，利执言，无咎；长子帅师，弟子舆尸，贞凶。
田里有猎物，利于发布明确的命令出击抓捕，没有灾祸；但如果让嫡长子（靠谱的人）带兵就行，要是让小儿子（不靠谱的亲信、弟子）带兵那就只能抬尸体回来，坚持这么干就凶险。
lines.en: There is game in the field. It furthers one to catch it. Without blame. Let the eldest lead the army. The younger transports corpses; Then perseverance brings misfortune.

lines.zh:
上六：大君有命，开国承家，小人勿用。
大战胜利后，大君（天子）颁布命令，封赏有功之人，开创诸侯国家、承续大夫家族，但千万不要重用小人。
lines.en: The great prince issues commands, Founds states, vests families with fiefs. Inferior people should not be employed.

summary.zh: 嘿，师卦讲的就是带队伍、打仗、管理一大帮人的那回事儿。核心就一句话：闹矛盾到没法调和了，得动真格了，但打仗这事儿风险超级大，所以必须师出有名、正大光明，而且得找个靠谱、有威望、老练的大佬来带队才行，不然很容易翻车。整个卦都在强调纪律、统帅能力和藏兵于民的平时准备。说白了就是：带人要正、选将要准、纪律要严、不能乱来。

judgement.zh:
比。吉。原筮，元永贞，无咎。不宁方来，后夫凶。

解释：比卦整体大吉大利。强调从一开始就要用至诚、永久守正的态度去亲近联合，就不会有灾祸。那些不安定、犹豫不决的国家或人会渐渐来归附，但如果拖到最后才来投靠，就会有凶险（错过时机，被排斥在外）。核心是亲比要及时、真诚、正直。
judgement.en: HOLDING TOGETHER brings good fortune. Inquire of the oracle once again Whether you possess sublimity, constancy, and perseverance; Then there is no blame. Those who are uncertain gradually join. Whoever come too late Meets with misfortune.

image.zh:
象曰：地上有水，比。先王以建万国，亲诸侯。

解释：卦象是水在地上流淌，水滋润大地，大地承载江河，二者亲密无间、互相依存。先王看到这个景象，就分封建立众多诸侯国，亲近、安抚诸侯，让天下和谐团结。
image.en: On the earth is water: The image of HOLDING TOGETHER. Thus the kings of antiquity Bestowed the different states as fiefs And cultivated friendly relations With the feudal lords.

tuan.en: What is required is that we unite with others, in order that all may complement and aid one another through holding together. But such holding together calls for a central figure around whom other persons may unite. To become a center of influence holding people together is a grave matter and fraught with great responsibility. It requires greatness of spirit, consistency, and strength. Therefore let him who wishes to gather others about him ask himself whether he is equal to the undertaking, for anyone attempting the task without a real calling for it only makes confusion worse than if no union at all had taken place. But when there is a real rallying point, those who at first are hesitant or uncertain gradually come in of their own accord. Late-comers must suffer the consequences, for in holding together the question of the right time is also important. Relationships are formed and firmly established according to definite inner laws. Common experiences strengthen these ties, and he who comes too late to share in these basic experiences must suffer for it if, as a straggler, he finds the door locked. If a man has recognized the necessity for union and does not feel strong enough to function as the center, it is his duty to become a member of some other organic fellowship.

lines.zh:
初六。有孚比之，无咎。有孚盈缶，终来有它，吉。
解释：用最诚恳的心去亲近别人，没毛病。你的诚意就像把酒缸装得满满的，虽然开始少，但最后会越聚越多，甚至有意外的好处，大吉。
lines.en: Hold to him in truth and loyalty; This is without blame. Truth, like a full earthen bowl" Thus in the end Good fortune comes from without.

lines.zh:
六二。比之自内，贞吉。
解释：从自己内部先搞好团结，向内求、靠中心走，坚持正道就吉祥。像内部先和谐，再对外扩展。
lines.en: Hold to him inwardly. Perseverance brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
六三。比之匪人。
解释：亲近了不该亲近的人（错付、站错队）。没说吉凶，但象曰‘不亦伤乎’，意思是很受伤、很悲哀，后果可想而知。
lines.en: You hold together with the wrong people.

lines.zh:
六四。外比之，贞吉。
解释：向外主动去亲近贤人、靠拢中心，坚持正道就吉祥。内外都要比，但方向不同，这里是向外求贤。
lines.en: Hold to him outwardly also. Perseverance brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
九五。显比，王用三驱，失前禽。邑人不诫，吉。
解释：光明正大地亲比团结，像君王打猎只从三面包围，前面故意放跑不追。老百姓自然归心，不用严厉警告就吉祥。意思是宽厚包容、来者不拒、去者不追，才是最高明的团结之道。
lines.en: Manifestation of holding together. In the hunt the king uses beaters on three sides only And forgoes game that runs off in front. The citizens need no warning. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
上六。比之无首，凶。
解释：亲比却没有找到头儿、没有开头、没赶上趟，彻底孤立，凶险。晚来一步就没位置了，孤家寡人。
lines.en: He finds no head for holding together. Misfortune.

summary.zh: 哎，哥们儿，这‘比’卦简单说就是讲怎么跟人搞好关系、抱团取暖的。核心就是一个字：亲！要真心实意地去靠近对的人、跟对的人站队，尤其是要找那个有实力、有德行、大家公认的中心（像九五那个位置），大家一起往那儿靠，早靠早好，靠得正就吉利。晚到或者站错队、跟错人就倒霉。生活中就是交朋友、找伙伴、职场站队、谈恋爱选对象，都得讲这个‘比’得对、比得早、比得真。团结就是力量，但得团结在正确的人和正确的道上，不然就是拉帮结派、朋党之争，那就惨了。

judgement.zh:
小畜。亨。密云不雨，自我西郊。

简要解释：小有蓄积，能够亨通。天上浓云密布，却不下雨，云气从我方西郊而来。象征力量尚小、蓄积有限，还没到大展宏图的时候，需要耐心等待时机，积蓄力量。
judgement.en: THE TAMING POWER OF THE SMALL Has success. Dense clouds, no rain from our western region.

image.zh:
风行天上，小畜。君子以懿文德。

简要解释：风在天上吹行，这就是小畜的卦象。君子看到这个景象，就去培养自己美好的文采和德行。意思是在力量还不足以大有作为时，要注重内在修养、提升品德和文化素养，以柔顺的方式慢慢影响和积聚。
image.en: The wind drives across heaven: The image of THE TAMING POWER OF THE SMALL.Thus the superior man Refines the outward aspect of his nature.

tuan.en: This image refers to the state of affairs in China at the time when King Wên, who came originally from the west, was in the east at the court of the reigning tyrant Chou Hsin. The moment for action on a large scale had not yet arrived. King Wên could only keep the tyrant somewhat in check by friendly persuasion. Hence the image of many clouds, promising moisture and blessing to the land, although as yet no rain falls. The situation is not unfavorable; there is a prospect of ultimate success, but there are still obstacles in the way, and we can merely take preparatory measures. Only through the small means of friendly persuasion can we exert any influence. The time has not yet come for sweeping measures. However, we may be able, to a limited extent, to act as a restraining and subduing influence. To carry out our purpose we need firm determination within and gentleness and adaptability in external relations.

lines.zh:
初九：复自道，何其咎？吉。
返回自己的正道，有什么过错呢？吉祥。像刚起步就知道回头走正轨，很聪明，不会出大问题。
lines.en: Return to the way. How could there be blame in this? Good fortune.

lines.zh:
九二：牵复，吉。
被别人牵引着返回正道，吉祥。说明有人拉你一把，或者你被形势带着走回正路，反而是好事。
lines.en: He allows himself to be drawn into returning. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
九三：舆说辐。夫妻反目。
车轮的辐条脱落了。夫妻互相瞪眼反目。太急躁、太刚强，硬往前冲，结果内部失控、关系破裂，典型的用力过猛翻车。
lines.en: The spokes burst out of the wagon wheels. Man and wife roll their eyes.

lines.zh:
六四：有孚，血去惕出，无咎。
心怀诚信，伤痛和恐惧都会离去，没有灾祸。用真诚和柔顺的态度去面对强硬的阻力，反而能化解危机，化险为夷。
lines.en: If you are sincere, blood vanishes and fear gives way. No blame.

lines.zh:
九五：有孚挛如，富以其邻。
心怀诚信，紧密团结，让邻居也跟着富起来。处在高位的人有诚意、讲信用，就能带着大家一起受益，真正的大格局。
lines.en: If you are sincere and loyally attached, You are rich in your neighbor.

lines.zh:
上九：既雨既处，尚德载。妇贞厉，月几望。君子征凶。
雨终于下了，也停了，德行已经满载。女人守正道还有危险，月亮快要满圆了。君子如果还出去征伐会有凶险。意思是积累到顶、成功已到，但物极必反，别再贪心冒进，得收手、守成，否则容易出事。
lines.en: The rain comes, there is rest. This is due to the lasting effect of character. Perseverance brings the woman into danger. The moon is nearly full. If the superior man persists, Misfortune comes.

summary.zh: 嘿，这小畜卦说白了就是：你现在实力还不够强，想法很大但暂时推不动，就像天上乌云很厚却下不了雨一样，得憋着。别硬刚、别急着往前冲，先稳住自己，回去走正道、拉着朋友一起回归正轨、别逞强逞到夫妻翻脸那种地步。用诚意去化解危机，慢慢积累，等到时机成熟、雨真正下来了，那才能真正发力。核心就俩字：蓄势 + 忍耐 + 修德，别小看这点“小积累”，它是大翻盘的前奏。

judgement.zh: 卦辞原文：履虎尾，不咥人，亨。解释：踩到老虎尾巴，老虎却不咬人，一切亨通顺利。意味着在危险环境中，只要谨慎守礼、柔顺行事，就能有惊无险，顺利通过。
judgement.en: TREADING. Treading upon the tail of the tiger. It does not bite the man. Success.

image.zh: 象曰原文：上天下泽，履。君子以辨上下，定民志。解释：天在上，泽在下，尊卑有序，这就是履卦的意象。君子从中领悟，要明辨上下等级，制定礼仪规范，让民众安守本分，心志安定。
image.en: Heaven above, the lake below: The image of TREADING. Thus the superior man discriminates between high and low, And thereby fortifies the thinking of the people.

tuan.en: The situation is really difficult. That which is strongest and that which is weakest are close together. The weak follows behind the strong and worries it. The strong, however, acquiesces and does not hurt the weak, because the contact is in goof humor and harmless. In terms of a human situation, one is handling wild, intractable people. In such a case one's purpose will be achieved if one behaves with decorum. Pleasant manners succeed even with irritable people.

lines.zh: 初九：素履，往，无咎。解释：穿着朴素的鞋子往前走，没灾祸。意思是保持本真、质朴，不花里胡哨地前进，就不会出问题，安心按自己的步调走。
lines.en: Simple conduct. Progress without blame.

lines.zh: 九二：履道坦坦，幽人贞吉。解释：道路平坦宽广，隐居的人守正道吉祥。意思是走在大道上心胸开阔，像隐士一样内心平静、不受干扰，坚持正道就吉利。
lines.en: Treading a smooth, level course. The perseverance of a dark man Brings good fortune.

lines.zh: 六三：眇能视，跛能履，履虎尾，咥人，凶。武人为于大君。解释：眼睛瞎了还勉强看，脚跛了还勉强走，踩虎尾被咬，凶。武人要当大君也一样危险。意思是能力不足却硬要逞强，盲目冒进，必遭祸殃。
lines.en: A one-eyed man is able to see, A lame man is able to tread. He treads on the tail of the tiger.

lines.zh: 九四：履虎尾，愬愬，终吉。解释：踩虎尾，战战兢兢害怕的样子，最终吉祥。意思是面对危险保持警惕、谨慎小心，最后能化险为夷，达成目标。
lines.en: He treads on the tail of the tiger. Caution and circumspection Lead ultimately to good fortune.

lines.zh: 九五：夬履，贞厉。解释：果断急速地行事，守正但有危险。意思是身居高位决策果断，虽然位置正当，但太急躁莽撞会有风险，要警惕。
lines.en: Resolute conduct. Perseverance with awareness of danger.

lines.zh: 上九：视履考祥，其旋元吉。解释：回顾走过的路，审视吉凶，反省周旋，大吉。意思是事情结束时好好反思过去的举动，总结经验，就能大吉大利。
lines.en: Look to your conduct and weigh the favorable signs. When everything is fulfilled, supreme good fortune comes.

summary.zh: 哥们，这履卦就像走在老虎屁股后面，胆战心惊但又得往前走。核心就是：做事要守规矩、讲礼貌、别莽撞，尤其在面对比自己强大的人或事时，低调点、谨慎点、和气点，就能化险为夷，顺顺利利过关。别逞强，别越界，谦虚守礼才是王道。

judgement.zh:
泰：小往大来，吉，亨。
简要解释：小人（阴）离去，大人（阳）到来，吉祥，亨通。这是天地交泰、阴阳和谐的极好局面，万物通达，事业顺利。
judgement.en: PEACE. The small departs, The great approaches. Good fortune. Success.

image.zh:
象曰：天地交，泰；后以财成天地之道，辅相天地之宜，以左右民。
简要解释：天地之气互相交感，形成通泰之象。君王/领导者应当效法天地，裁成调理自然规律，帮助万物各得其宜，从而治理百姓、安抚天下。
image.en: Heaven and earth unite: the image of PEACE. Thus the ruler Divides and completes the course of heaven and earth, And so aids the people.

tuan.en: This hexagram denotes a time in nature when heaven seems to be on earth. Heaven has placed itself beneath the earth, and so their powers unite in deep harmony. Then peace and blessing descend upon all living things. In the world of man it is a time of social harmony; those in high places show favor to the lowly, and the lowly and inferior is an end to all feuds. In side, at the center, in the key position, is the light principle; the dark principle is outside. Thus the light has a powerful influence, while the dark is submissive. In this way each receives its due. When the good elements of society occupy a central position and are in control, the evil elements come under their influence and change for the better. When the spirit of heaven rules in man, his animal nature also comes under its influence and takes its appropriate place. The individual lines enter the hexagram from below and leave it again at the top. Here the small, weak, and evil elements are about to take their departure, while the great, strong, and good elements are moving up. This brings good fortune and success.

lines.zh:
初九：拔茅茹，以其汇，征吉。
意思是：连根拔起茅草，根茎相连带着同类一起前进，出行大吉。比喻志同道合的朋友互相牵引，一起向上发展，前途光明。
lines.en: When ribbon grass is pulled up, the sod comes with it. Each according to his kind. Undertakings bring good fortune.

lines.zh:
九二：包荒，用冯河，不遐遗，朋亡，得尚于中行。
意思是：包容荒远之人，像徒步涉过大河一样果敢，不遗弃远方的人，舍弃私党私交，走中正之道就能得到崇尚。强调胸怀宽广、不结党营私、光明正大才能真正通达。
lines.en: Bearing with the uncultured in gentleness, Fording the river with resolution, Not neglecting what is distant, Not regarding one's companions:

lines.zh:
九三：无平不陂，无往不复。艰贞无咎。勿恤其孚，于食有福。
意思是：没有永远平坦不生坡的路，没有只去不回来的事。处艰难而守正道就没有灾咎，不要担心诚信问题，在祭祀饮食上自然有福。提醒盛极之时要警惕物极必反，保持艰苦奋斗的精神才能持盈保泰。
lines.en: No plain not followed by a slope. No going not followed by a return. He who remains persevering in danger Is without blame. Do not complain about this truth; Enjoy the good fortune you still possess.

lines.zh:
六四：翩翩，不富，以其邻，不戒以孚。
意思是：翩翩然轻快飞舞，虽然不富有，却和邻人一起，不用告诫就自然诚信。比喻在通泰之时，柔顺谦虚、不贪图个人财富，与周围人自然和谐互信。
lines.en: He flutters down, not boasting of his wealth, Together with his neighbor, Guileless and sincere.

lines.zh:
六五：帝乙归妹，以祉，元吉。
意思是：像商王帝乙嫁妹妹那样，以此得到福祉，大吉大利。比喻以至尊之位下嫁（谦虚下交），用柔顺中正的态度联姻/合作，能带来大吉大利。
lines.en: The sovereign I Gives his daughter in marriage. And supreme good fortune.

lines.zh:
上六：城复于隍，勿用师。自邑告命，贞吝。
意思是：城墙崩塌回填到干涸的护城壕里，不宜用兵。从邑中自行发布命令，坚持下去有憾恨。提醒泰到极点就要转向否，形势已逆转，强行抵抗只会更糟，物极必反的警示。
lines.en: The wall falls back into the moat. Use no army now. Make your commands known within your own town. Perseverance brings humiliation.

summary.zh: 哥们儿，泰卦就是当下超级顺的那种状态！天地终于不闹别扭了，上面和下面通气了，阳气上升、阴气下降，大家想法一致，好事扎堆来。小付出大回报，简直是人生高光时刻。但老祖宗也提醒你：现在虽然爽翻天，可万物有周期，盛极必反，别太飘，保持谦虚谨慎、居安思危才能长久爽下去。

judgement.zh:
否之匪人，不利君子贞，大往小来。

意思是：闭塞、阻隔的状态下，不是有利于君子坚持正道的时候。大（阳气/君子）离去，小（阴气/小人）到来，天地不通，上下不交。
judgement.en: STANDSTILL. Evil people do not further The perseverance of the superior man. The great departs; the small approaches.

image.zh:
象曰：天地不交，否；君子以俭德辟难，不可荣以禄。

意思是：天和地不互相交通，形成闭塞之象。君子在这种时候应该用节俭、低调的德行来躲避灾难，不可以追求荣耀和俸禄来显扬自己。
image.en: Heaven and earth do not unite: The image of STANDSTILL. Thus the superior man falls back upon his inner worth In order to escape the difficulties. He does not permit himself to be honored with revenue.

tuan.en: Heaven and earth are out of communion and all things are benumbed. What is above has no relation to what is below, and on earth confusion and disorder prevail. The dark power is within, the light power is without. Weakness is within, harshness without. Within are the inferior, and without are the superior. The way of inferior people is in ascent; the way of superior people is one the decline. But the superior people do not allow themselves to be turned from their principles. If the possibility of exerting influence is closed to them, they nevertheless remain faithful to their principles and withdraw into seclusion.

lines.zh:
初六：拔茅茹，以其汇，贞吉亨。
→ 虽然处在最下面的闭塞阶段，但能和同类（同是小人或同处困境的人）互相连结、抱团取暖，坚持正道还是有吉祥通达的可能。
lines.en: When ribbon grass is pulled up, the sod comes with it. Each according to his kind. Perseverance brings good fortune and success.

lines.zh:
六二：包荒，用冯河，不遐遗，朋亡，得尚于中行。
→ 包容大度，像徒步涉过大河一样果敢，不遗弃远方的人，但也不结党营私，保持中正的道路，能得到中行（中正）的赞赏。
lines.en: They bear and endure; This means good fortune for inferior people. The standstill serves to help the great man to attain success.

lines.zh:
六三：包羞。
→ 被小人包围、裹挟，做了丢脸的事，或者处于羞辱、尴尬的处境，很难堪。
lines.en: They bear shame.

lines.zh:
九四：有命无咎，畴离祉。
→ 得到上天/上面的命令或时机，照着做就不会有灾祸，和同类（志同道合的人）一起离开困境，就能共同获得福祉。
lines.en: He who acts at the command of the highest Remains without blame. Those of like mind partake of the blessing.

lines.zh:
九五：休否，君子以利用，终小人否。
→ 闭塞的局面开始休止/缓解，君子要抓住这个转机好好利用，最终小人的闭塞/嚣张气焰会被终结。
lines.en: Standstill is giving way. Good fortune for the great man. "What if it should fail, what if it should fail?" In this way he ties it to a cluster of mulberry shoots.

lines.zh:
上九：倾否，先否后喜。
→ 把闭塞的局面彻底倾覆推倒，先是经历否塞的艰难，后来转为喜悦。否极泰来，彻底翻盘的爻。
lines.en: The standstill comes to an end. First standstill, then good fortune.

summary.zh: 哥们儿，这卦就是现在超级不顺、卡得死死的那个感觉。天地不交，小人当道，好人/正能量被挤到边上去了，啥事都推进不动，硬刚肯定吃亏。当前阶段别指望大展拳脚，最聪明的做法就是先苟住、低调做人、保护好自己，等风头过去再动。典型的‘先保命，再发育’卦。

judgement.zh:
同人。同人于野，亨。利涉大川，利君子贞。

意思是：在广阔的原野上与人志同道合，非常亨通。有利于渡过大河难关，也有利于君子保持正直坚贞的品德。强调要大公无私、胸怀广阔地团结人，而不是局限于小圈子，这样才能成就大事。
judgement.en: FELLOWSHIP WITH MEN in the open. Success. It furthers one to cross the great water. The perseverance of the superior man furthers.

image.zh:
象曰：天与火，同人；君子以类族辨物。

意思是：天在上，火在下，天火相合就是同人卦。君子从中得到启示，要按照事物的种类和族群去分辨辨别万物。也就是说，真正的同人不是盲目拉拢所有人，而是要明白物以类聚、人以群分，找到真正志同道合的人。
image.en: Heaven together with fire: The image of FELLOWSHIP WITH MEN. Thus the superior man organizes the clans And makes distinctions between things.

tuan.en: True fellowship among men must be based upon a concern that is universal. It is not the private interests of the individual that create lasting fellowship among men, but rather the goals of humanity. That is why it is said that fellowship with men in the open succeeds. If unity of this kind prevails, even difficult and dangerous tasks, such as crossing the great water, can be accomplished. But in order to bring about this sort of fellowship, a persevering and enlightened leader is needed--a man with clear, convincing, and inspiring aims and the strength to carry them out. (The inner trigram means clarity; the outer, strength.)

lines.zh:
初九：同人于门，无咎。
刚开始就光明正大地在门外与人交往，没有私心，没有毛病，自然没啥过错。
lines.en: Fellowship with men at the gate. No blame.

lines.zh:
六二：同人于宗，吝。
只跟自己宗族、自己小圈子的人搞团结，虽然亲近，但格局太小，会带来遗憾和困难。
lines.en: Fellowship with men in the clan. Humiliation.

lines.zh:
九三：伏戎于莽，升其高陵，三岁不兴。
藏军队在丛林里，爬上高坡观察，三年都起不来。想争、想抢同人对象，但手段不正、时机不对，结果憋屈很久都动弹不得。
lines.en: He hides weapons in the thicket; He climbs the high hill in front of it. For three years he does not rise up.

lines.zh:
九四：乘其墉，弗克攻，吉。
已经爬上敌方城墙了，却攻不下来，停手反而吉祥。意思是遇到阻碍时要懂得适可而止，不硬刚到底反而能避祸得吉。
lines.en: He climbs up on his wall; he cannot attack. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
九五：同人，先号咷而后笑，大师克，相遇。
一开始哭天抢地很焦虑，后来却大笑，因为动用大军最终战胜障碍，和志同道合的人胜利会师。代表经过艰难考验，真心相同的人最终能聚在一起，大获成功。
lines.en: Men bound in fellowship first weep and lament, But afterward they laugh. After great struggles they succeed in meeting.

lines.zh:
上九：同人于郊，无悔。
在郊外（比较偏远的地方）与人同心，虽然没达到最理想的‘于野’大同境界，但也没什么可后悔的。算是退而求其次，但仍然保持了正直，没走歪路。
lines.en: Fellowship with men in the meadow. No remorse.

summary.zh: 嘿，同人卦简单说就是讲‘找对的人一起干大事’。核心就是别搞小圈子、小团体，要敞开心胸，在大范围内跟志同道合的人团结起来，这样才能干成难事、成大事。关键是要公心、无私、守正，不能因为私情、偏见把圈子搞窄了。找到对的伙伴，一起冲，基本就稳了。

judgement.zh:
大有：元亨。
原文出自《周易》：大有卦象征大有收获、拥有盛大财富与光明。元亨表示大吉大利、极为顺利亨通，是六十四卦中吉祥程度名列前茅的卦象之一。
judgement.en: POSSESSION IN GREAT MEASURE. Supreme success.

image.zh:
象曰：火在天上，大有；君子以竭恶扬善，顺天休命。
意思是：太阳高高挂在天上，普照大地，象征拥有盛大光明与资源。君子看到这个景象，就要努力去除邪恶、发扬善良，顺应上天赋予的美好命运。
image.en: Fire in heaven above: The image of POSSESSION IN GREAT MEASURE. Thus the superior man curbs evil and furthers good, And thereby obeys the benevolent will of heaven.

tuan.en: The two trigrams indicate that strength and clarity unite. Possessions great measure is determined by fate and accords with the time. How is it possible that the weak line has power to hold the strong lines fast and to possess them? It is done by virtue of unselfish modesty. The time is favorable--a time of strength within, clarity and culture without. Power is expressing itself in graceful and controlled way. This brings supreme success and wealth.

lines.zh:
初九：无交害，匪咎，艰则无咎。
刚开始有资源但还没跟人产生复杂关系，没什么坏处。虽然处境有点艰难，但只要小心谨慎就不会有错。
lines.en: No relationship with what is harmful; There is no blame in this. If one remains conscious of difficulty, One remains without blame.

lines.zh:
九二：大车以载，有攸往，无咎。
像一辆超大卡车装满了货物，可以放心大胆往前走，没问题。比喻能力强、资源足，适合大展身手。
lines.en: A big wagon for loading. One may undertake something. No blame.

lines.zh:
九三：公用亨于天子，小人弗克。
大的资源和功绩要拿去给国家/天子（大公无私地奉献），普通小人承担不了这么大的福分。提醒有大成就的人要懂得上交、分享，别独吞。
lines.en: A prince offers it to the Son of Heaven. A petty man cannot do this.

lines.zh:
九四：匪其彭，无咎。
不要表现得太盛大、太张扬（彭=盛大貌），收敛一点就没有灾祸。越有实力越要低调。
lines.en: He makes a difference Between himself and his neighbor. No blame.

lines.zh:
六五：厥孚交如，威如；吉。
用真诚去交往，别人自然感受到你的威信和力量，这样非常吉祥。讲的是以诚待人反而更有领导力。
lines.en: He whose truth is accessible, yet dignified, Has good fortune.

lines.zh:
上九：自天祐之，吉无不利。
得到上天的保佑，吉祥，没有任何不利。到了最上面一层，反而回归最纯粹的谦虚与顺天，结果一切都好。
lines.en: He is blessed by heaven. Good fortune. Nothing that does not further.

summary.zh: 大有这一卦超级顺，讲的就是‘有大收获、大成功、大资源在手’的感觉。就像你突然中了大奖、事业爆火、贵人超级多、什么都顺的那种状态。但越有钱有名越要低调、谦虚、别嚣张，不然容易招黑、招祸。核心就八个字：有大成就要会守大成，越有越要善良正直、帮人利他，这样才能长久大有。

judgement.zh:
谦。亨，君子有终。
谦虚低调反而亨通顺利，真正有德行的君子能够把谦虚坚持到底，善始善终。
judgement.en: MODESTY creates success. . The superior man carries things through.

image.zh:
地中有山，谦。君子以裒多益寡，称物平施。
山高大地低，山却藏在地里，象征内里高大、外表谦卑。君子看到这个象，就懂得把多的拿来补少的，衡量东西多少公平分给别人。
image.en: Within the earth, a mountain: The image of MODESTY. Thus the superior man reduces that which is too much, And augments that which is too little. He weighs things and makes them equal.

tuan.en: It is the law of heaven to make fullness empty and to make full what is modest; when the sun is at its zenith, it must, according to the law of heaven, turn toward its setting, and at its nadir it rises toward a new dawn. In obedience to the same law, the moon when it is full begins to wane, and when empty of light it waxes again. This heavenly law works itself out in the fates of men also. It is the law of earth to alter the full and to contribute to the modest. High mountains are worn down by the waters, and the valleys are filled up. It is the law of fate to undermine what is full and to prosper the modest. And men also hate fullness and love the modest. The destinies of men are subject to immutable laws that must fulfill themselves. But man has it in his power to shape his fate, according as his behavior exposes him to the influence of benevolent or of destructive forces. When a man holds a high position and is nevertheless modest, he shines with the light of wisdom; if he is in a lowly position and is modest, he cannot be passed by. Thus the superior man can carry out his work to the end without boasting of what he has achieved.

lines.zh:
初六：谦谦君子，用涉大川，吉。
最下面这爻最谦虚，再谦虚一点的君子，哪怕去干很冒险的事（渡大河），也会吉祥。解释：起步就超级低调，把自己放得很低，反而安全有保障。
lines.en: A superior man modest about his modesty May cross the great water. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
六二：鸣谦，贞吉。
谦虚的美德传扬开来，坚持正道就吉祥。解释：你低调有内涵，别人慢慢都知道你人好又有本事，但你自己还不骄傲，坚持本心就好运继续。
lines.en: Modesty that comes to expression. Perseverance brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
九三：劳谦君子，有终吉。
有功劳还谦虚的君子，会有好结局，大吉。解释：全卦最牛的一爻，干了很多事有大贡献，但从不翘尾巴、把功劳挂嘴边，这种人最终一定有好报。
lines.en: A superior man of modesty and merit Carries things to conclusion. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
六四：无不利，撝谦。
没有什么不利的，只要发挥谦虚就行。解释：位置已经很高了，还能继续把谦虚表现出来，到处都顺，没有任何坏处。
lines.en: Nothing that would not further modesty In movement.

lines.zh:
六五：不富以其邻，利用侵伐，无不利。
自己不富裕但带动邻居一起富，利用这个去讨伐不听话的，没任何不利。解释：虽然自己不算最强，但靠谦虚赢得了大家支持，这时候该硬气的时候也能硬，收拾那些不守规矩的很顺利。
lines.en: No boasting of wealth before one's neighbor. It is favorable to attack with force. Nothing that would not further.

lines.zh:
上六：鸣谦，利用行师，征邑国。
谦虚的名声远扬，利于出兵，征讨附近的邑国。解释：谦虚到最后反而声望极高，大家都服你，这时候用武力解决小问题（内部或周边不服的），非常合适，没阻力。
lines.en: Modesty that comes to expression. It is favorable to set armies marching To chastise one's own city and one's country.

summary.zh: 哎，谦卦其实就一句话：越谦虚越牛，越低调越有回报。满招损谦受益这道理放这儿最准。卦里六爻几乎全是吉，告诉你只要你肯把姿态放低、不抢风头、不居功、不硬刚，该你的迟早是你的，坚持下去最后肯定有好结果。生活中就当个老好人？不是，是有实力还知道藏着掖着、该出力时出力、该让步时让步，这样的人走到最后往往笑得最开心。

judgement.zh:
豫。利建侯行师。
原文意思：豫卦象征喜悦、和乐、顺势而动。利于建立诸侯、巩固政权，也利于出兵作战。核心是顺应时机、预先准备，才能在欢乐中成就大事。
judgement.en: ENTHUSIASM. It furthers one to install helpers And to set armies marching.

image.zh:
象曰：雷出地奋，豫。先王以作乐崇德，殷荐之上帝，以配祖考。
原文意思：雷声从地面震动而出，万物随之振奋，这就是豫的景象。古代先王看到这个卦象，于是制作音乐来彰显美德，用盛大的音乐祭祀上帝，并以祖先配享。强调在喜悦时要崇尚德行、感恩天地祖先，而不是单纯享乐。
image.en: Thunder comes resounding out of the earth: The image of ENTHUSIASM. Thus the ancient kings made music In order to honor merit, And offered it with splendor To the Supreme Deity, Inviting their ancestors to be present.

tuan.en: The time of ENTHUSIASM derives from the fact that there is at hand an eminent man who is in sympathy with the spirit of the people and acts in accord with it. Hence he finds universal and willing obedience. To arouse enthusiasm it is necessary for a man to adjust himself and his ordinances to the character of those whom he has to lead. The inviolability of natural laws rests on this principle of movement along the line of least resistance. Theses laws are not forces external to things but represent the harmony of movement immanent in them. That is why the celestial bodies do not deviate from their orbits and why all events in nature occur with fixed regularity. It is the same with human society: only such laws are rooted in popular sentiment can be enforced, while laws violating this sentiment merely arouse resentment. Again, it is enthusiasm that enables us to install helpers for the completion of an undertaking without fear of secret opposition. It is enthusiasm too that can unify mass movements, as in war, so that they achieve victory.

lines.zh:
初六：鸣豫，凶。
刚有点开心就到处嚷嚷、显摆，自鸣得意过头了，早晚乐极生悲，凶险。
lines.en: Enthusiasm that expresses itself Brings misfortune.

lines.zh:
六二：介于石，不终日，贞吉。
像石头一样坚定有原则，快乐不沉迷其中，不到一天就收敛，守正道就吉祥。
lines.en: Firm as a rock. Not a whole day. Perseverance brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
六三：盱豫，悔。迟有悔。
仰着头巴结讨好有权有势的人求快乐，肯定后悔；拖拖拉拉不及时醒悟，也会后悔。两头都悔。
lines.en: Enthusiasm that looks upward creates remorse. Hesitation brings remorse.

lines.zh:
九四：由豫，大有得。勿疑，朋盍簪。
因为真正懂得豫的道理（顺动有备），收获超级大。别怀疑，大家像簪子聚头发一样团结归附你。
lines.en: The source of enthusiasm. He achieves great things. Doubt not. You gather friends around you As a hair clasp gathers the hair.

lines.zh:
六五：贞疾，恒不死。
虽然坚守正道但还是会生点小病（或小危机），但因为中正持久，不会真正完蛋。
lines.en: Persistently ill, and still does not die.

lines.zh:
上六：冥豫，成，有渝无咎。
沉迷享乐到昏天黑地、都成习惯了，但只要能及时改变、醒悟过来，就没啥大祸。
lines.en: Deluded enthusiasm. But if after completion one changes, There is no blame.

summary.zh: 哎，豫卦说白了就是‘开心的时候别太嗨过头’。表面看是雷动地顺、万物欢腾的好时候，事业、感情、机会都顺风顺水，特别适合干大事、拉队伍、打仗啥的。但关键就在于：快乐来得快去得也快，乐极容易生悲。所以得提前准备、居安思危，像春雷惊醒大地一样，顺势而为但别飘了。核心一句话：顺着势头动没错，但动之前心里要有数，别把自己玩脱了。

judgement.zh:
隨。元亨，利貞，無咎。
原文卦辭：大吉大利，利於守正，沒有災禍。意思是只要順應時勢、隨和適應、堅持正道，就能亨通無礙，沒什麼壞事。
judgement.en: FOLLOWING has supreme success. Perseverance furthers. No blame.

image.zh:
象曰：澤中有雷，隨。君子以向晦入宴息。
澤上有雷（雷藏澤中），象徵隨順天時。君子看到這個卦象，就懂得要順應自然規律：天黑了就該回家休息、放鬆、入睡，不硬幹不合時宜的事。
image.en: Thunder in the middle of the lake: The image of FOLLOWING. Thus the superior man at nightfall Goes indoors for rest and recuperation.

tuan.en: In order to obtain a following one must first know how to adapt oneself. If a man would rule he must first learn to serve, for only in this way does he secure from those below him the joyous assent that is necessary if they are to follow him. If he has to obtain a following by force or cunning, by conspiracy or by creating faction, he invariably arouses resistance, which obstructs willing adherence. But even joyous movement can lead to evil consequences, hence the added stipulation, "Perseverance furthers" --that is, consistency in doing right-- together with "No blame." Just as we should not ask others to follow us unless this condition is fulfilled, so it is only under this condition that we can in turn follow others without coming to harm. The thought of obtaining a following through adaptation to the demands of the time is a great and significant idea; this is why the appended judgment is so favorable.

lines.zh:
初九：官有渝，貞吉。出門交有功。
職位或立場有變化，堅持正道就吉。走出門去廣交朋友、積極社交，反而能建功立業。→ 變動別怕，動起來反而有機會。
lines.en: The standard is changing. Perseverance brings good fortune. To go out of the door in company Produces deeds.

lines.zh:
六二：繫小子，失丈夫。
抓住了小男孩，卻丟了成熟的丈夫。→ 太貪小便宜、跟錯人、黏著不靠譜的小咖，就會錯過真正有價值的大人物。眼光要放長遠。
lines.en: If one clings to the little boy, One loses the strong man.

lines.zh:
六三：繫丈夫，失小子。隨有求得，利居貞。
抓住了大男人，丟了小男孩。追隨有追求就能得到，利於安居守正。→ 懂得捨棄小的、跟對人、選有前途的對象或道路，雖然短期有失，但長遠有得，踏實守正最好。
lines.en: If one clings to the strong man, One loses the little boy.

lines.zh:
九四：隨有獲，貞凶。有孚在道，以明，何咎？
追隨別人而有所獲，固守下去反倒凶險。只要真誠守道、光明正大，就沒什麼過錯。→ 跟對了老大賺到錢，但別太貪、別死抱不放，保持清醒和原則才安全。
lines.en: Following creates success. Perseverance brings misfortune. To go one's way with sincerity brings clarity. How could there be blame in this?

lines.zh:
九五：孚於嘉，吉。
真誠信守美好的、正大的東西，吉祥。→ 位居中正，誠信待人、追求高尚的價值觀，這是最棒的隨，結果大吉。
lines.en: Sincere in the good. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
上六：拘繫之，乃從維之，王用亨於西山。
被人拘禁綁縛，卻因此而跟隨維繫，王因此在西山亨通。→ 到極點了，強行被綁住反而成就大事（像文王被拘羑里卻因此得天下）。有時候被動的「隨」也會帶來大轉機，關鍵看時機。
lines.en: He meets with firm allegiance And is still further bound. The king introduces him To the Western Mountain.

summary.zh: 哎，隨卦說白了就是『順勢而為，隨大流但要有原則』。這卦超chill，告訴你別總硬剛、別死磕，世界變化快，跟著走、適時調整、別違背本心和正道，反而最順、最省力、最能成事。像談戀愛、職場、人生，強求不如水到渠成，該跟誰就跟誰，該放手就放手，關鍵要真誠、守正，自然大家都願意跟你混。

judgement.zh:
蛊。元亨，利涉大川。先甲三日，后甲三日。
蛊卦象征积弊已久、腐败混乱的状态，但只要及时整治、拨乱反正，就能大为亨通。利于跨越重大困难（涉大川），但行动前要提前三天仔细考察分析现状（先甲三日），行动后也要后续三天观察后果、完善措施（后甲三日），才能真正终而有始、开启新局面。
judgement.en: WORK ON WHAT HAS BEEN SPOILED Has supreme success. It furthers one to cross the great water. Before the starting point, three days. After the starting point, three days.

image.zh:
山下有风，蛊。君子以振民育德。
山下有风吹拂，万物散乱、败坏之象。君子看到这个卦象，就要效法风的振奋作用，去振作民众、培育道德，治理腐败、教化人心，重振秩序。
image.en: The wind blows low on the mountain: The image of DECAY. Thus the superior man stirs up the people And strengthens their spirit.

tuan.en: What has been spoiled through man's fault can be made good again through man's work. IT is not immutable fate, as in the time of STANDSTILL, that has caused the state of corruption, but rather the abuse of human freedom. Work toward improving conditions promises well, because it accords the possibilities of the time. We must not recoil from work and danger-symbolized by crossing of the great water-but must take hold energetically. Success depends, however, on proper deliberation. This is expressed by the lines, "Before the starting point, three days. After the starting point, three days." We must first know the cause of corruption before we can do away with them; hence it is necessary to be cautious during the time before the start. Then we must see to it that the new way is safely entered upon, so that a relapse may be avoided; therefore we must pay attention to the time after the start. Decisiveness and energy must take the place of inertia and indifference that have led to decay, in order that the ending may be followed by a new beginning.

lines.zh:
初六：干父之蛊，有子，考无咎。厉，终吉。
（解释：有儿子能整治父亲败坏的事业，父亲就没有过错了。虽然有危险，但最终吉祥。像孝顺儿子接手收拾父亲留下的烂摊子，虽然过程有点惊险，但结果是好的。）
lines.en: Setting right what has been spoiled by the father. If there is a son, No blame rests upon the departed father. Danger. In the end good fortune.

lines.zh:
九二：干母之蛊，不可贞。
（解释：整治母亲造成的弊端，不可过于固执死板。得中道、柔和处理才行。像处理妈妈那边的问题，不能太刚硬，得讲究方式方法。）
lines.en: Setting right what has been spoiled by the mother. One must not be too persevering.

lines.zh:
九三：干父之蛊，小有悔，无大咎。
（解释：整治父亲的弊端，稍有懊悔，但没有大错。干得有点猛，会有小遗憾，但大局没问题，属于正常代价。）
lines.en: Setting right what has been spoiled by the father. There will be a little remorse. No great blame.

lines.zh:
六四：裕父之蛊，往见吝。
（解释：宽裕、放任父亲的弊端，继续下去会有困难和羞吝。光想慢慢来、包容过去的问题，结果越拖越糟。）
lines.en: Tolerating what has been spoiled by the father. In continuing one sees humiliation.

lines.zh:
六五：干父之蛊，用誉。
（解释：整治父亲的弊端，受到人们的赞誉。用德行来承接、治理，赢得好名声。位置好、方法对，自然大家都夸你。）
lines.en: Setting right what has been spoiled by the father. One meets with praise.

lines.zh:
上九：不事王侯，高尚其事。
（解释：不侍奉王侯，把自己的志向看得高尚。彻底超脱世俗事务，专注于更高的精神追求或自我修养，大家都觉得这种志向值得效法。）
lines.en: He does not serve kings and princes, Sets himself higher goals.

summary.zh: 哎呀，蛊卦其实就是告诉你：事情已经乱套了、坏习惯积太久了、上一代留下的烂摊子摆在那儿，但别慌！这时候正是大干一场、彻底革新的好时机。关键是你得有决心去收拾残局，像接手爸妈败坏的家业一样，该改的改，该治的治。别拖着别放任，认真规划好前因后果，就能翻盘成功，迎来新气象。说白了就是‘旧的不去新的不来’，但得你亲自上手干活才行，不然就继续烂下去咯。

judgement.zh:
临。元，亨，利，贞。至于八月有凶。

原文大意：大吉大利，亨通顺利，有利于坚持正道。但要警惕，到了八月（盛极而衰之时）会有凶险。提醒人在顺境巅峰时要居安思危，别得意忘形。
judgement.en: APPROACH has supreme success. Perseverance furthers. When the eighth month comes, . There will be misfortune.

image.zh:
象曰：泽上有地，临。君子以教思无穷，容保民无疆。

大意：泽上有大地，高临其上。君子从中得到启发：要用无穷的教化去感化民众，用宽广的胸怀去保护百姓，没有止境。
image.en: The earth above the lake: The image of APPROACH. Thus the superior man is inexhaustible In his will to teach, And without limits In his tolerance and protection of the people.

tuan.en: The hexagram as a whole points to a time of joyous, hopeful progress. Spring is approaching. Joy and forbearance bring high and low nearer together. Success is certain. But we must work with determination and perseverance to make full use of the propitiousness of the time. And on thing more: spring does not last forever. In the eighth month the aspects are reversed. Then only two strong, light lines are left; these do not advance but are in retreat (see next hexagram). We must take heed of this change in good time. If we meet evil before it becomes reality-before it has even begun to stir-we can master it.

lines.zh:
初九：咸临，贞吉。
以真诚感化的态度去临近、领导下面的人，坚持正道就吉祥。刚开始就得用真心，别玩虚的。
lines.en: Joint approach. Perseverance brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
九二：咸临，吉，无不利。
继续用真诚感化去临下，吉祥，没啥不利的。这爻最强，阳刚得中，又有应，简直是最佳领导状态。
lines.en: Joint approach. Good fortune. Everything furthers.

lines.zh:
六三：甘临，无攸利；既忧之，无咎。
靠甜言蜜语、讨好式管理去临下，没啥好处。但只要你能意识到问题、开始反省忧虑，就不会有什么大过错。提醒别当老好人、别只会哄。
lines.en: Comfortable approach. Nothing that would further. If one is induced to grieve over it, One becomes free of blame.

lines.zh:
六四：至临，无咎。
亲自靠前、亲力亲为地去临近下属/民众，没有灾祸。领导不能光发号施令，得下来走走、看看、摸摸实情。
lines.en: Complete approach. No blame.

lines.zh:
六五：知临，大君之宜，吉。
用智慧、明智的方式去临下，这是伟大君主最合适、最应该做的态度，吉祥。最高领导就得靠脑子、靠格局，而不是靠吼靠骗。
lines.en: Wise approach. This is right for a great prince. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
上六：敦临，吉，无咎。
用敦厚、诚恳、宽厚的态度去临下，吉祥，没毛病。到顶层了，反而要更厚道、更实在，才能收好尾、不翻车。
lines.en: Great hearted approach. Good-hearted approach. Good fortune. No blame.

summary.zh: 哎，这卦简单说就是‘春天来了，好日子到啦’。你现在地位高、势力强，或者机会特别好，下边的人都挺你、顺着你，感觉一切顺利、大家开心。但别太嗨过头了！这时候最容易飘，飘着飘着秋天就来了，阳气一退就变味儿。所以现在要抓紧用真心、用智慧去带人、教人、帮人，别光享受，别用假甜话哄人，也别偷懒，得亲自上阵、厚道做人，这样才能把好局面尽可能延长。核心就俩字：以德临人 + 居安思危。

judgement.zh:
觀。盥而不薦，有孚顒若。

原文意思是：祭祀开始时洗手灌酒请神降临，但还没到献上祭品的环节，就已经表现出极其庄重恭敬、诚信仰慕的样子。整体象征一种“被觀察、被仰望”的狀態，強調以德服人、風行地上、教化天下，不需強力推行，自然讓人觀瞻效法。
judgement.en: CONTEMPLATION. The ablution has been made, But not yet the offering. Full of trust they look up to him.

image.zh:
象曰：風行地上，觀。先王以省方，觀民設教。

風在大地上吹拂，象徵德教像風一樣普遍傳播。先王效法這個卦象，巡視四方，觀察民情，設立教化，讓天下人自然歸順、受到感化。
image.en: The wind blows over the earth: The image of CONTEMPLATION. Thus the kings of old visited the regions of the world, Contemplated the people, And gave them instruction.

tuan.en: The sacrificial ritual in China began with an ablution and a libation by which the Deity was invoked, after which the sacrifice was offered. The moment of time between these two ceremonies is the most sacred of all, the moment of deepest inner concentration. If piety is sincere and expressive of real faith, the contemplation of it has a transforming awe-spiring effect on those who witness it. Thus also in nature a holy seriousness is to be seen in the fact that natural occurrences are uniformly subject to law. Contemplation of the divine meaning underlying the workings of the universe gives to the man who is called upon to influence others the means of producing like effects. This requires that power of inner concentration which religious contemplation develops in great men strong in faith. It enables them to apprehend the mysterious and divine laws of life, and by means of profoundest inner concentration they give expression to these laws in their own persons. Thus a hidden spiritual power emanates from them, influencing and dominating others without their being aware of how it happens.

lines.zh:
初六：童觀，小人無咎，君子吝。
像小孩子一樣淺薄、幼稚地觀看。對普通老百姓沒啥大問題（無咎），但如果你是想成大事的君子，這樣膚淺的眼光就會讓你陷入困境、被人看輕。
lines.en: Boy like contemplation. For an inferior man, no blame. For a superior man, humiliation.

lines.zh:
六二：窺觀，利女貞。
像女人從門縫偷偷觀看一樣，視野狹窄、偷偷摸摸。這種觀察方式適合女人守貞（在家相夫教子），但對男人或想幹大事的人來說，就顯得有點可羞、可笑，不夠光明正大。
lines.en: Contemplation through the crack of the door. Furthering for the perseverance of a woman.

lines.zh:
六三：觀我生，進退。
轉而反觀自己的人生、自己的行為和處境。通過自我反省來決定是進還是退。關鍵在於要時時檢視自己，才不會走偏。
lines.en: Contemplation of my life Decides the choice Between advance and retreat.

lines.zh:
六四：觀國之光，利用賓于王。
觀看國家（或君王）的光輝政績和德行。這時最適合做賓客、輔佐君王、參與政事，憑借這種洞察可以得到重用。
lines.en: Contemplation of the light of the kingdom. It furthers one to exert influence as the guest of a king.

lines.zh:
九五：觀我生，君子無咎。
居於君王之位，時時反省自己的言行是否合乎大道、是否能為萬民表率。只要能不斷自我檢視、完善自己，君子就不會有過失。
lines.en: Contemplation of my life. The superior man is without blame.

lines.zh:
上九：觀其生，君子無咎。
處於最高位卻沒有實權，像退休的賢人或在野高士，只能觀察君王的作為和百姓的生活。雖然不在其位，但能持續關注、保持清醒的判斷，君子也沒有過錯。
lines.en: Contemplation of his life. The superior man is without blame.

summary.zh: 嘿，這『觀』卦啊，簡單說就是『被看』、『被觀摩』的意思。上面風吹下面地，風到哪兒地就跟著動，代表領導者或有德之人只要把自己站好、德行擺正，不用吆喝，大家自然抬頭看你、學你。就像現在很多人說的『以身作則』、『人格魅力』、『躺平輸出影響力』。這卦提醒你：別急著去推銷自己，先把內在修好，讓別人主動來『觀』你、來認同你。適合觀察、學習、展示、教化、等待時機的階段，不適合強行出頭或亂動。

judgement.zh:
噬嗑。亨。利用狱。

意思是：噬嗑卦，通达顺利。利于审理刑狱、断案执法。
judgement.en: BITING THROUGH has success. It is favorable to let justice be administered.

image.zh:
象曰：雷电噬嗑；先王以明罚敕法。

意思是：上震为雷、下离为电，雷电交加咬合之象。先王看到这个卦象，就制定明确的刑罚、整饬法令，让法律清晰、惩罚分明。
image.en: Thunder and lighting: The image of BITING THROUGH. Thus the kings of former times made firm the laws Through clearly defined penalties.

tuan.en: When an obstacle to union arises, energetic biting through brings success. This is true in all situations. Whenever unity cannot be established, the obstruction is due to a talebearer and traitor who is interfering and blocking the way. To prevent permanent injury, vigorous measures must be taken at once. Deliberate obstruction of this sort does not vanish of its own accord. Judgment and punishment are required to deter or obviate it. However, it is important to proceed in the right way. The hexagram combines Li, clarity, and Chên, excitement. Li is yielding, Chên is hard. Unqualified hardness and excitement would be too violent in meting out punishment; unqualified clarity and gentleness would be too weak. The two together create the just measure. It is of moment that the man who makes the decisions (represented by the fifth line) is gentle by nature, while he commands respect by his conduct in his position.

lines.zh:
初九：屦校灭趾，无咎。
刚开始犯小错就被惩戒（脚镣把脚趾都磨破了），虽然疼，但能制止更大的错误，所以没大问题。
lines.en: His feet are fastened in the stocks, So that his toes disappear. No blame.

lines.zh:
六二：噬肤灭鼻，无咎。
咬到柔软的肉（比喻容易处理的小问题），虽然用力过猛把鼻子都碰伤了，但事情本身不难解决，没啥大错。
lines.en: Bites through tender meat, So that his nose disappears. No blame.

lines.zh:
九三：噬腊肉，遇毒。小吝，无咎。
咬到干硬的腊肉，还吃出中毒的感觉，过程很费劲也有点小倒霉，但只要坚持处理完，没根本性的大错。
lines.en: Bites on old dried meat And strikes on something poisonous. Slight humiliation. No blame.

lines.zh:
九四：噬乾胏，得金矢。利艰贞，吉。
啃很硬的带骨头的干肉，终于咬到了金属箭头（象征刚硬的刑具/法律）。处境艰难，但保持正直坚持原则，结果吉祥。
lines.en: Bites on dried gristly meat. Receives metal arrows. It furthers one to be mindful of difficulties And to be persevering. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
九五：噬乾肉，得黄金。贞厉，无咎。
咬很干的肉，终于得到纯金（象征最核心、最刚硬的东西）。虽然处在这个位置要保持警惕、如履薄冰，但守正道就不会有大过错。
lines.en: Bites on dried lean meat. Receives yellow gold. Perseveringly aware of danger.

lines.zh:
上九：何校灭耳，凶。
戴着沉重的大枷锁，把耳朵都磨烂了，大凶。到了这一步，已经是罪大恶极、惩戒过重或顽固不化到极点，下场很惨。
lines.en: His neck is fastened in the wooden cangue, So that his ears disappear. Misfortune.

summary.zh: 简单说，这卦就是“咬东西”那感觉——中间有硬骨头、梗着的东西，得用力咬合、嚼碎才能往下咽。现实里遇到堵着、卡着、不通顺的事（矛盾、纠纷、障碍、坏人、陋习），不能绕、不能忍，必须正面刚、用力“嗑”掉它。过程虽然费劲、有时还带点疼，但只要方法对、力度够，最后是通的、顺的。特别适合讲规矩、讲法律、处理冲突、除障碍、整纪律的场景。

judgement.zh:
贲。亨。小利有攸往。

原文卦辞：贲卦亨通，小事利于有所行动。
简要解释：贲代表文饰、装饰、文明的外在表现。卦象山下有火，照亮山体使万物焕彩，象征内在本质加上适当文饰能通达，但文饰不是根本，只适合小范围施展，不宜过分或用于大事。
judgement.en: GRACE has success. In small matters It is favorable to undertake something.

image.zh:
象曰：山下有火，贲。君子以明庶政，无敢折狱。

原文象辞：山下有火，这就是贲卦的卦象。君子因此修明各项政事，不敢轻易判决狱讼。
简要解释：火在山下照耀，使万物文采焕发，君子观此取法：注重文明教化、明察政务细节，但面对重大刑狱判决要慎之又慎，避免凭表面文饰而草率断案，强调质重于文。
image.en: Fire at the foot of the mountain: The image of GRACE. Thus does the superior man proceed When clearing up current affairs. But he dare not decide controversial issues in this way.

tuan.en: Grace brings success. However, it is not the essential or fundamental thing; it is only the ornament and therefore be used sparingly and only in little things. In the lower trigram of fire a yielding line comes between two strong lines and makes them beautiful, but the strong lines are the essential content and the weak line is the beautifying form. In the upper trigram of the mountain, the strong line takes the lead, so that here again the strong element must be regarded as the decisive factor. In nature we see in the sky the strong light of the sun; the life of the world depends on it. But this strong, essential thing is changed and given pleasing variety by the moon and the stars. In human affairs, aesthetic form comes into being when traditions exist that, strong and abiding like mountains, are made pleasing by a lucid beauty. By contemplating the forms existing in the heavens we come to understand time and its changing demands. Through contemplation of the forms existing in human society it becomes possible to shape the world.

lines.zh:
初九：贲其趾，舍车而徒。
解释：装饰自己的脚，舍弃马车而步行。起步阶段要低调朴实，别急着摆排场，宁可脚踏实地走路，也不要贪图表面舒服而失了本分。
lines.en: He lends grace to his toes, leaves the carriage, and walks.

lines.zh:
六二：贲其须。
解释：装饰长者的胡须。像柔顺地辅助在上位的刚爻，扮好配角、锦上添花的角色，跟着有实力的人一起出彩，自己不抢风头。
lines.en: Lends grace to the beard on his chin.

lines.zh:
九三：贲如，濡如，永贞吉。
解释：装饰得光泽润湿的样子，永远保持正道就吉祥。外表打扮得很亮眼漂亮，但要警惕沉迷于浮华，要长久守正才能保住这份光彩。
lines.en: Graceful and moist. Constant perseverance brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
六四：贲如皤如，白马翰如，匪寇，婚媾。
解释：装饰得素白的样子，白马飞奔而来，不是强盗，而是来求婚的。追求朴素纯白的美，排除干扰后，真正合适的对象就出现了，像婚嫁一样自然结合。
lines.en: Grace or simplicity? A white horse comes as if on wings. He is not a robber, He will woo at the right time.

lines.zh:
六五：贲于丘园，束帛戋戋，吝，终吉。
解释：在山丘园圃中装饰，用微薄的束帛礼品，虽然显得吝啬小气，但最终吉祥。宁可朴实节俭、注重内在，也不搞奢华浪费，礼轻情意重，反而能得善终。
lines.en: Grace in the hills and gardens. The roll of silk is meager and small. Humiliation, but in the end good fortune.

lines.zh:
上九：白贲，无咎。
解释：纯白无华的装饰，没有灾咎。到了极点，抛开一切花里胡哨，返回最朴素的本真状态，反而最高级的美，无过无咎。
lines.en: Simple grace. No blame.

summary.zh: 嘿，这贲卦说白了就是『包装很重要，但别本末倒置』。东西本身得有料，外表打扮打扮能加分，让人眼前一亮，所以小事情、表面功夫、形象管理、礼仪这些地方用用挺顺的，能亨通。但要是想干大事、长久的事儿，光靠刷外表、搞形式主义那是不行的，容易华而不实。核心就是：适当美化可以，但内在的质朴和本质才是根本，别让装饰盖过了本质。像谈恋爱初期靠颜值加分能顺利推进，但真要过日子还得看人品和相处；工作上穿得体面点有助于面试，但真本事才是长久之计。

judgement.zh:
剥。不利有攸往。
原文意思：剥落之时，什么行动都不利。阳气被阴气不断侵蚀剥落，只剩最后一丝阳气，君子势力衰弱，小人得势，这时候硬碰硬往前冲只会加速崩盘，所以最聪明的做法就是先别动，静观其变，等时机。
judgement.en: SPLITTING APART. IT does not further one To go anywhere.

image.zh:
象曰：山附于地，剥。上以厚下，安宅。
原文意思：山附着在大地上，这就是剥的景象。在上位的人看到这个卦象，应该用厚道来对待下面的人，这样自己的位置才能稳固安稳。基础越牢，上层才不会轻易崩塌。
image.en: The mountain rests on the earth: The image of SPLITTING APART. Thus those above can ensure their position Only by giving generously to those below.

tuan.en: This pictures a time when inferior people are pushing forward and are about to crowd out the few remaining strong and superior men. Under these circumstances, which are due to the time, it is not favorable for the superior man to undertake anything. The right behavior in such adverse times is to be deduced from the images and their attributes. The lower trigram stands for the earth, whose attributes. The lower trigram stands for the earth, whose attributes are docility and devotion. The upper trigram stands for the mountain, whose attribute is stillness. This suggests that one should submit to the bad time and remain quiet. For it is a question not of man's doing but of time conditions, which, according to the laws of heaven, show an alternation of increase and decrease, fullness and emptiness. It is impossible to counteract these conditions of the time. Hence it is not cowardice but wisdom to submit and avoid action.

lines.zh:
初六：剥床以足，蔑贞凶。
床脚先烂掉了。问题从最底层、最不显眼的地方开始腐蚀，根基动摇还不自知，坚持下去肯定凶险。赶紧修基础，别等全塌了。
lines.en: The leg of the bed is split. Those who persevere are destroyed. Misfortune.

lines.zh:
六二：剥床以辨，蔑贞凶。
床腿上面的分隔部分（床板和床脚连接处）也开始剥落了。问题继续往上蔓延，已经伤到重要支撑点了，还不警惕就真要翻车了，凶。
lines.en: The bed is split at the edge. Those who persevere are destroyed. Misfortune.

lines.zh:
六三：剥之，无咎。
被剥了，但居然没事。为什么？因为它跟下面那帮阴爻不是一路货，暗中跟上面的阳爻有联系，立场没完全站错队，所以虽然身处剥的环境，但能免于大祸。
lines.en: He splits with them. No blame.

lines.zh:
六四：剥床以肤，凶。
现在连床面（贴身的那层）都剥掉了。灾难已经近在眼前、切肤之痛了，凶险到极点，再不醒悟就彻底玩完了。
lines.en: The bed is split up to the skin. Misfortune.

lines.zh:
六五：贯鱼，以宫人宠，无不利。
像一串鱼一样连贯地排列，带着宫女去接受宠爱，无不利。阴爻到顶点了，领着众阴柔顺地依附唯一的阳爻，就像后宫佳丽排队侍奉君王。只要肯低头、顺势而为，反而能转危为安，什么都顺利。
lines.en: A shoal of fishes. Favor comes through the court ladies. Everything acts to further.

lines.zh:
上九：硕果不食，君子得舆，小人剥庐。
大果子挂在那没人吃。君子如果处在上面，就能得到大家的拥戴，像坐在大车上一样稳；但小人如果占了这个位置，就会把自己的房子都拆了（自毁）。意思是最后一丝阳气很珍贵，君子守得住就能翻盘，小人继续作妖只会彻底完蛋。
lines.en: There is a large fruit still uneaten. The superior man receives a carriage. The house of the inferior man is split apart.

summary.zh: 哥们儿，这剥卦简单说就是现在是低谷期，小人当道、好人受气、东西一点点被蚕食掉的感觉。就像大冬天树叶全掉光，只剩光秃秃的枝干。啥都别急着干，冲动只会让自己更惨。最好的策略就是：低调、忍耐、守住最后那点底线，别再丢东西了。熬过去就是复卦，一阳来复，春天就来了。耐心点，别作死往前冲。

judgement.zh:
復：亨。出入無疾，朋來無咎。反覆其道，七日來復，利有攸往。

意思是：復卦整體亨通順利。進出沒有疾病（障礙），朋友來訪也沒有過錯。事物反覆循環它的規律，七天就會回來一次，利於有所前往行動。
judgement.en: RETURN. Success. Going out and coming in without error. Friends come without blame. To and fro goes the way. On the seventh day comes return. It furthers one to have somewhere to go.

image.zh:
象曰：雷在地中，復。先王以至日閉關，商旅不行，后不省方。

意思是：雷聲藏在地底下，這就是復的象徵。先王因此在冬至這一天關閉城門，不讓商人旅客通行，君王也不巡視四方。象徵陽氣剛開始復生，要像冬至一樣靜養、閉關，等待時機。
image.en: Thunder within the earth: The image of THE TURNING POINT. Thus the kings of antiquity closed the passes At the time of solstice. Merchants and strangers did not go about, And the ruler Did not travel through the provinces.

tuan.en: After a time of decay comes the turning point. The powerful light that has been banished returns. There is movement, but it is not brought about by force. The upper trigram K'un is characterized by devotion; thus the movement is natural, arising spontaneously. For this reason the transformation of the old becomes easy. The old is discarded and the new is introduced. Both measures accord with the time; therefore no harm results. Societies of people sharing the same views are formed. But since these groups come together in full public knowledge and are in harmony with the time, all selfish separatist tendencies are excluded, and no mistake is made. The idea of RETURN is based on the course of nature. The movement is cyclic, and the course completes itself. Therefore it is not necessary to hasten anything artificially. Everything comes of itself at the appointed time. This is the meaning of heaven and earth. All movements are accomplished in six stages, and the seventh brings return. Thus the winter solstice, with which the decline of the year begins, comes in the seventh month after the summer solstice; so too sunrise comes in the seventh double hour after sunset. Therefore seven is the number of the young light, and it arises when six, the number of the great darkness, is increased by one. In this way the state of rest gives place to movement.

lines.zh:
初九：不遠復，無祗悔，元吉。
剛開始犯錯沒走遠就回來了，不會有大的悔恨，大吉大利。最早、最及時的回頭，當然最棒。
lines.en: Return from a short distance. No need for remorse. Great good fortune.

lines.zh:
六二：休復，吉。
停下來好好休息、安心回歸正道，吉祥。跟著對的人、聽仁德的建議回來，特別順。
lines.en: Quiet return. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
六三：頻復，厲，無咎。
反反覆覆地犯錯又回來，雖然有危險，但最終沒大過錯。屢敗屢戰、屢錯屢改，也算有救。
lines.en: Repeated return. Danger. No blame.

lines.zh:
六四：中行獨復。
走在半路獨自回頭（周圍人都不回，只有自己回）。雖然孤單，但這是走正道的表現，沒有吉凶斷語，重點是堅持原則。
lines.en: Walking in the midst of others, One returns alone.

lines.zh:
六五：敦復，無悔。
敦厚、誠懇地回歸正道，不會有悔恨。最真誠、最厚道的回頭方式，穩穩的沒後顧之憂。
lines.en: Noblehearted return. No remorse.

lines.zh:
上六：迷復，凶，有災眚。用行師，終有大敗；以其國君，凶；至於十年，不克征。
徹底迷路了還不回頭，大凶，有災禍。如果帶兵打仗，會徹底大敗，連國君都遭殃，十年之內都翻不了身。最慘的結局：死不悔改。
lines.en: Missing the return. Misfortune. Misfortune from within and without. If armies are set marching in this way, One will in the end suffer a great defeat, Disastrous for the ruler of the country. For ten years It will not be possible to attack again.

summary.zh: 哥們兒，這卦就是講『冬天過去了，春天要來了』的那種感覺。一陽初生，萬物開始慢慢復甦。之前可能倒霉透頂、被剝得光溜溜（剝卦），現在終於熬到頭了，陽氣回來了！關鍵是：犯錯別走太遠，趕緊回頭；回頭越早越好，越誠懇越好。別死扛、別嘴硬，及時止損、迷途知返才是王道。現在適合低調蓄力、修身養性，別急著大幹快上，等陽氣再壯一點再動。總之：壞日子到頭了，好日子在路上，但你得配合它回來啊！

judgement.zh:
无妄。元亨，利贞。其匪正有眚，不利有攸往。
意思是：无妄卦大吉大利，亨通顺利，利于坚守正道。但如果行为不正，就会招来灾祸，不利于有所行动。核心是强调要真实、自然、守正，不搞虚的、不妄求、不乱来，顺天应人才能通达。
judgement.en: INNOCENCE. Supreme success. Perseverance furthers. If someone is not as he should be, He has misfortune, And it does not further him To undertake anything.

image.zh:
象曰：天下雷行，物与无妄。先王以茂对时，育万物。
意思是：天上雷声滚动，万物都因此而不敢虚妄、各自安守本分。先王看到这个景象，就勤勉努力，顺应四时节令，来养育万物。像春天打雷，万物惊醒生长，一切都真实自然。
image.en: Under heaven thunder rolls: All things attain the natural state of innocence. Thus the kings of old, Rich in virtue, and in harmony with the time, Fostered and nourished all beings.

tuan.en: Man has received from heaven a nature innately good, to guide him in all his movements. By devotion to this divine spirit within himself, he attains an unsullied innocence that leads him to do right with instinctive sureness and without any ulterior thought of reward and personal advantage. This instinctive certainty brings about supreme success and 'furthers through perseverance". However, not everything instinctive is nature in this higher sense of the word, but only that which is right and in accord with the will of heaven. Without this quality of rightness, an unreflecting, instinctive way of acting brings only misfortune. Confucius says about this: "He who departs from innocence, what does he come to? Heaven's will and blessing do not go with his deeds."

lines.zh:
初九：无妄，往吉。
最下面这根阳爻，代表刚开始就很真实、不妄为，这种状态往前走是大吉的。起步正，就容易成功。
lines.en: Innocent behavior brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
六二：不耕获，不菑畲，则利有攸往。
不种地就想收粮食，不开荒就想有熟田，这种妄想当然不行。但这里是说如果你能真正脚踏实地、不抱不切实际的幻想，反而做事会顺利有回报。
lines.en: If one does not count on the harvest while plowing,

lines.zh:
六三：无妄之灾。或系之牛，行人之得，邑人之灾。
最经典的“无妄之灾”：自己没做坏事，却摊上事儿。就像有人把牛拴路边，被过路人顺走，村里人却被怀疑、挨骂、受牵连。告诉你：有时候天灾人祸就是这么莫名其妙，防不胜防，只能认了，继续守正。
lines.en: Undeserved misfortune.

lines.zh:
九四：可贞，无咎。
可以坚守正道，就不会有灾祸。位置虽然有点尴尬，但只要老老实实、不乱动、不妄为，就能平安无事。
lines.en: He who can be persevering Remains without blame.

lines.zh:
九五：无妄之疾，勿药有喜。
得了病却是“无妄之疾”——不是自己作的，而是意外或自然来的小毛病。不用吃药，自己就会好，会有喜事。说明守正的人，连病都来得清清白白，去得也轻松。
lines.en: Use no medicine in an illness Incurred through no fault of your own. It will pass of itself.

lines.zh:
上九：无妄，行有眚，无攸利。
到了顶上，还想动、还想往前冲，哪怕出发点是“无妄”的，也会出问题，没啥好处。告诉你：该停就停，别画蛇添足，过犹不及。
lines.en: Innocent action brings misfortune.

summary.zh: 哥们儿，这无妄卦讲的就是一句话：别瞎想、别乱来、别搞虚的，老老实实按规律办事，按本心做事。守住正道就大吉大利，稍微歪一点就容易倒霉。生活中最怕的就是自己骗自己，或者总想着不劳而获、天上掉馅饼，结果往往事与愿违。最好的状态就是真实点、踏实点，顺其自然，该干啥干啥，反而啥都顺。

judgement.zh:
大畜。利贞，不家食，吉。利涉大川。

**简要解释**：大蓄积、大积聚的意思。利于守正，坚持正道有吉祥。不在家自己吃饭（意思是出去做官、得俸禄、被国家养贤），吉利。利于渡过大河（做大事、冒风险、克服大困难也行得通）。整体是大有积蓄、厚积薄发的吉卦，但要正派、守规矩才能真正发挥作用。
judgement.en: THE TAMING POWER OF THE GREAT. Perseverance furthers. Not eating at home brings good fortune. It furthers one to cross the great water.

image.zh:
象曰：天在山中，大畜。君子以多识前言往行，以畜其德。

**简要解释**：天广大却被包容在山里面，这就是大蓄积的意象。君子看到这个，就应该多去学习、记住古人的好话、好行为，用来积累、滋养自己的道德修养。强调内在的学问和德行的大积累。
image.en: Heaven within the mountain: The image of THE TAMING POWER OF THE GREAT. Thus the superior man acquaints himself with many sayings of antiquity And many deeds of the past, In order to strengthen his character thereby.

tuan.en: To hold firmly to great creative powers and store them up, as set forth in this hexagram, there is need of a strong, clear-headed man who is honored by the ruler. The trigram Ch'ein points to strong creative power; Kên indicates firmness and truth. Both point to light and clarity and to the daily renewal of character. Only through such daily self-renewal can a man continue at the height of his powers. Force of habit helps to keep order in quiet times; but in periods when there is a great storing up of energy, everything depends on the power of the personality. However, since the worthy are honored, as in the case of the strong personality entrusted with leadership by the ruler, it is an advantage not to eat at home but rather to earn one's bread by entering upon public office. Such a man is in harmony with heaven; therefore even great and difficult undertakings, such as crossing the great water, succeed.

lines.zh:
初九：有厉，利已。
有危险，利于停止（别动）。
刚开始有点冲劲，但上面有阻力，硬上会出事，先刹车保平安。
lines.en: Danger is at hand. It furthers one to desist.

lines.zh:
九二：舆说輹。
车子脱了轴（车轮子掉下来了）。
想前进但被卡住，自动停下来了。意思是遇到阻力时别硬来，顺其自然停一停，反而没啥大问题。
lines.en: The axletrees are taken from the wagon.

lines.zh:
九三：良马逐，利艰贞。曰闲舆卫，利有攸往。
好马在追逐奔跑，利于在艰难中守正。经常训练车马防卫，利于有所往。
实力已经很强了，可以出发，但要小心、守规矩、做好准备，才能真正走得远。
lines.en: A good horse that follows others. Awareness of danger, With perseverance, furthers. Practice chariot driving and armed defense daily. It furthers one to have somewhere to go.

lines.zh:
六四：童牛之牿，元吉。
小牛犊子给它戴上木牿（防止它乱顶），大吉。
在问题还没变严重时就提前管住、约束它（防患于未然），结果超级好。
lines.en: The headboard of a young bull. Great good fortune.

lines.zh:
六五：豮豕之牙，吉。
把公猪的牙势给阉割了（去势），吉祥。
碰到很厉害、有攻击性的东西，用柔软、高明的办法把它最危险的部分去掉，就能化险为夷，吉利。
lines.en: The tusk of a gelded boar. Good fortune.

lines.zh:
上九：何天之衢，亨。
何等宽阔的天街大道啊，亨通。
积累到顶点了，阻碍全没了，像走在最宽广的天空大道上，一切畅通无阻，大成功、大通达。
lines.en: One attains the way of heaven.

summary.zh: 嘿，这卦简单说就是：你现在是在攒大招、攒实力、攒内功的阶段。别急着乱冲，时机还没完全到，但你底子已经很厚了。像天那么刚健有力的东西都被大山给稳稳止住了——说明你有大能量，但得学会控制、积累、别乱喷。好好读书、修德、攒经验、养实力，等到真该爆发的时候，就能干大事、过大坎、吃朝廷的饭（被重用、有大成就）。一句话：现在别浪，先憋大招，憋好了以后爽翻天。

judgement.zh:
颐。贞吉。观颐，自求口实。
意思是：颐卦，守正就吉祥。观察别人是怎么养生的，更要看自己怎么谋生、怎么自给自足。核心就是强调自力更生、靠自己吃饭才是正道。
judgement.en: THE CORNERS OF THE MOUTH. Perseverance brings good fortune. Pay heed to the providing of nourishment And to what a man seeks To fill his own mouth with. In bestowing care and nourishment, it is important that the right people should be taken care of and that we should attend to our own nourishment in the right way. If we wish to know what anyone is like, we have only to observe on whom he bestows his care and what sides of his own nature he cultivates and nourishes. Nature nourishes all creatures. The great man fosters and takes care of superior men, in order to take care of all men through them. Mencius says about this:

image.zh:
山下有雷，颐。君子以慎言语，节饮食。
山下面有雷在动，就像嘴巴在咀嚼的样子。君子看到这个卦象，就要提醒自己：说话要特别小心谨慎，吃东西要懂得节制。嘴巴是祸福之门，管好嘴就管好了很多麻烦。
image.en: At the foot of the mountain, thunder: The image of PROVIDING NOURISHMENT. Thus the superior man is careful of his words And temperate in eating and drinking.

tuan.en: If we wish to know whether anyone is superior or not, we need only observe what part of his being he regards as especially important. The body has superior and inferior, important and unimportant parts. We must not injure important parts for the sake of the unimportant, nor must we injure the superior parts for the sake of the inferior. He who cultivates the inferior parts of his nature is an inferior man. He who cultivates the superior parts of his nature is a superior man.

lines.zh:
初九：舍尔灵龟，观我朵颐，凶。
你本来有自己的宝贝（像灵龟一样能自给自足），却眼巴巴盯着我这边大口吃东西的样子——这就凶了。意思是：有本事自己养活自己，别羡慕别人吃香喝辣。
lines.en: You let your magic tortoise go, And look at me with the corners of your mouth drooping. Misfortune.

lines.zh:
六二：颠颐，拂经，于丘颐，征凶。
颠倒着养（靠倒过来求人），违背常理，在山坡上求养（辛苦又不正道），往前走就凶。简单说：为了吃饭不择手段、颠倒黑白、违背原则去求人，结局很惨。
lines.en: Turning to the summit for nourishment, Deviating from the path

lines.zh:
六三：拂颐，贞凶，十年勿用，无攸利。
完全违背养生的正道，坚持错误不改，凶。十年都别想翻身，没一点好处。就是那种死不悔改、走歪路还一条道走到黑的人，下场最惨。
lines.en: Turning away from nourishment. Perseverance brings misfortune. Do not act thus for ten years.

lines.zh:
六四：颠颐，吉。虎视眈眈，其欲逐逐，无咎。
虽然也是颠倒着求养，但吉。像老虎盯着猎物一样专注，欲望追得很紧，却没灾祸。意思是：向上求养的时候态度端正、认真谨慎、有底线，就能没问题。
lines.en: Turning to the summit For provision of nourishment Brings good fortune.

lines.zh:
六五：拂经，居贞吉，不可涉大川。
虽然有点违背常理，但安居守正就吉祥，不能去冒险涉大河。就是说：在关键位置上，偶尔非常规一点没关系，但一定要守住底线，别去干冒险的事。
lines.en: Turning away from the path.

lines.zh:
上九：由颐，厉吉，利涉大川。
大家都靠他来养活，虽然有危险但最终吉祥，利于跨越大河。意思是：当你成了大家依靠的“大饭票”，责任重大、有风险，但只要小心就能大吉，还能干大事、闯大关。
lines.en: The source of nourishment. Awareness of danger brings good fortune. It furthers one to cross the great water.

summary.zh: 嘿，这卦说白了就是告诉你：想活得好、养得好，别老盯着别人碗里的肉，自己动手才是硬道理。颐就是养，养身体、养精神、养前途，都得靠正道、自力更生。嘴巴这个东西最容易惹祸，所以说话悠着点，吃东西别太贪。总之一句话——求人不如求己，管住嘴、管住欲望，自己养活自己最踏实。最忌讳的就是好吃懒做、投机取巧、靠啃别人过日子，那基本没好下场。

judgement.zh:
大過。棟橈。利有攸往，亨。

意思是：大過卦，栋梁被压得弯曲了（房子快要塌了，极端过度的危机状态）。但利于有所行动，前行反而亨通。表面看是大危机，但只要敢于非常规作为、挺身而出，反而能转危为安。
judgement.en: PREPONDERANCE OF THE GREAT. The ridgepole sags to the breaking point. It furthers one to have somewhere to go. Success.

image.zh:
象曰：澤滅木，大過。君子以獨立不懼，遁世無悶。

意思是：大泽淹没了树木，这就是大过的卦象。君子看到这种极端状况，应该学会在乱世中独立支撑而不害怕，实在不行就隐退避世，也能内心不烦闷、不郁结。
image.en: The lake rises above the trees: The image of PREPONDERANCE OF THE GREAT. Thus the superior man, when he stands alone, Is unconcerned, And if he has to renounce the world, He is undaunted.

tuan.en: The weight of the great is excessive. The load is too heavy for the strength of the supports. The ridgepole on which the whole roof rests, sags to the breaking point, because its supporting ends are too weak for the load they bear. It is an exceptional time and situation; therefore extraordinary measures are demanded. It is necessary to find a way of transition as quickly as possible, and to take action. This promises success. For although the strong element is in excess, it is in the middle, that is, at the center of gravity, so that a revolution is not to be feared. Nothing is to be achieved by forcible measures. The problem must be solved by gently penetration to the meaning of the situation (as is suggested by the attribute of the inner trigram, Sun); then the change-over to other conditions will be successful. It demands real superiority; therefore the time when the great preponderates is a momentous time.

lines.zh:
初六：藉用白茅，无咎。
用白茅草垫着放祭器，小心谨慎到极点，就不会出大错。像在极端危险时先做好最基础的防护，别莽撞。
lines.en: To spread white rushes underneath.

lines.zh:
九二：枯楊生稊，老夫得其女妻，无不利。
枯树又发新芽，老头娶了年轻媳妇，没啥不利的。意思是虽然整体很衰败，但局部还能找到生机、意外收获，阴阳互补反而有转机。
lines.en: A dry poplar sprouts at the root. An older man takes a young wife. Everything furthers.

lines.zh:
九三：棟橈，凶。
栋梁直接弯曲了，大凶。太刚太直、不知变通，死扛到底，结果就是彻底崩盘。最危险的一爻。
lines.en: The ridgepole sags to the breaking point. Misfortune.

lines.zh:
九四：棟隆，吉；有它，吝。
栋梁反而隆起（向上拱起），吉祥；但如果有其他变故、旁骛，就会有遗憾。说明在危机中主动调整、把压力转化成支撑力是可行的，但不能分心。
lines.en: The ridgepole is braced. Good fortune. If there are ulterior motives, it is humiliating.

lines.zh:
九五：枯楊生華，老婦得其士夫，无咎无譽。
枯树开花，老太太嫁给年轻小伙，没罪过也没啥好名声。比喻虽然不正常、不匹配，但勉强能维持，没大错但也没荣耀，属于过渡性的无奈组合。
lines.en: A withered poplar puts forth flowers. An older woman takes a husband.

lines.zh:
上六：過涉滅頂，凶，无咎。
过度涉水，水淹到头顶，大凶，但最终无咎。明知危险还硬要冲过去，差点淹死，但因为是尽忠职守或义无反顾，反而没留下骂名（虽凶而无咎）。
lines.en: One must go through the water. It goes over one's head. Misfortune. No blame.

summary.zh: 哥们儿，这卦就是告诉你现在局面已经『过』得离谱了，像房梁被压弯、泽水淹树，随时可能崩盘。正常路子走不通了，常规方法救不了场。但别慌，这时候反而要敢出大招、非常手段，一个人顶住压力往前冲，或者干脆退隐自保。核心就俩字：非常时期，非常之人，非常之举。扛得住就能翻盘，扛不住就体面撤退，别硬扛到灭顶。

judgement.zh:
坎。习坎，有孚，维心亨，行有尚。
